The End of the Brown Scare

With the threat of a fascist coup effectively "defeated" in $COUNTRY$- a sense of normality has been restored and many previously disrupted political movements (unfortunately including Fascism) are being gradually restored to the previous political liberties that they had before the crisis had begun.
The End of the Red Scare

With the threat of a communist revolution effectively "defeated" in $COUNTRY$- a sense of normality has been restored and many previously disrupted political movements (including Communism) are being gradually restored to the previous political liberties that they had before the crisis had begun.

With the leadership of the previous government dealt with in $COUNTRY$- a sense of normality has been restored and many previously disrupted political movements are being gradually restored to the previous political liberties that they had before the crisis had begun.

The various Socialist factions of $COUNTRY$ have seized the capital and toppled the government of the rich. Many believe that Revolution shall lead to a democratic republic where even the reactionary and liberals can participate in elections whereas many think that a Socialist republic where only the Revolutionary parties can run in elections will be the only way to end the Old Order. The leader of the revolution could also take extended power to inflict the same violence on our enemies like they have made us suffered over the previous years.

The various Socialist factions of $COUNTRY$ have seized the capital and toppled the government of the rich. Many believe that Revolution shall lead to a democratic republic where even the reactionary and liberals can participate in elections. However, the leader of the revolution could also take extended power to inflict the same violence on our enemies like they have made us suffered over the previous years.

$COUNTRY$ has failed to maintain substantial control over a large portion of its territory and now faces inquiries by its population regarding the ability of the regime to protect its citizens against foreign powers. Ideas that had been previously considered unthinkable under such a totalitarian state are now considered viable alternatives for the future of the country as the government has clearly shown that it is unable to maintain control of enough of its territory and to beat back and crush these insurgencies. With a wide host of emotions and bated breath, many citizens of $COUNTRY$ are convinced that the winds of political change are revisiting the nation...

$COUNTRY$ has somehow outlasted a entire decade of continued insurgency and the regime has been restored to the its position as a successful totalitarian regime once more. All hail $MONARCHTITLE$ and his eternally enduring regime!

As vast swaths of our country have been occupied by hostile forces, the anxiety and frustration with the current cabinet have reached a new breaking point. The king now has been secretly approached by some deserting ministers of the ruling party to launch a swift and decisive coup against the organisation that has caused us this much trouble, for the sake of $COUNTRY$. While the uprooting of the party from the state is going to be a smooth process in the face of the current situation, if the party decides to step down, that is, it does also mean that our harsh measures against the citizens will cease in favour of a return to normalcy. On the other hand, however, the party and its remaining potentates might very well refuse to step down and take unprecedented actions against the monarchy. The fate of $COUNTRY$ now rests in the hands of the party.
The Fascists stand down for the sake of the nation.
$COUNTRY$ may be fracturing, but the king has no right to choose its fate!

As $COUNTRY$ slowly descents into riots and chaos over the recent election results, the now-ruling Fascist Party of our nation has begun to instate a number of executive orders to crack down on the menace of the streets of our cities with unprecedented brutality. One sizeable portion of the royal court of His Majesty is increasingly growing anxious over these new developments, fearing that they might bring ruin to our nation. Another vocal portion advocates for a continuation of a symbiotic relationship between the fascists and the  $COUNTRY_ADJ$ monarchy, to bring back the past glory and stability of our historic past. As the uncertainty in the population is evolving towards frustration and anger, the king has decided to address his subjects regarding the fascist party and the future of $COUNTRY$.
The king saluted the symbiosis of Fascism and Monarchism!
The king asked them politely, yet firmly, to step down!
The Establishment of the Popular Republic

With the general turmoil of the recent years subsiding in favor of an uneasy peace and with fall of the old order of things, our young socialist republic has emerged from the ashes after a clique of various left-wing political organization managed to come to an agreement regarding the new administration of our country. While peace in our time seems possible, the facade of the republic is already being questioned by the two wings of the provisional government: a moderate faction wants to return to a more libertarian approach towards the state structure, limiting the reach of the socialist vanguard which ought to be legitimized in regular elections. The Radicals, however, believe that the socialist republic is the wrong measure and are already discrediting it as a bourgeoise deception. The soul of the young people's republic has yet to be determined.
... So raise the scarlet standard high!

Parliamentary and presidential elections - one of the first tests for the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ socialist republic - were postponed after the results were less than favourable for the ruling socialist conglomerate of wildly different left-wing political organizations. These news gave the incentive for the radical vanguard of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ socialist hardliners to de-legitimize the victories of parties outside the ruling socialist bloc, postponing the elections until the "the socialist republic is secured from within". Whatever the true intentions were, and despite the anger this move has caused in moderate circles, the socialist party has reemerged as victor from the elections, although not in a democratic fashion...
We will not fall back under bourgeois control.
It gives the hope of peace that lasts.

In a rather unsettling turn of events, the ruling bloc of socialist organizations came to the conclusions to not recognize the recent election results after a narrow vote within the bloc to do so in the face of growing popularity of more reactionary organizations in $COUNTRY$. This sparked outrage on virtually every side, as the hardliners condemn the moderates for allowing such an unstable construct to exist in the first place, while more democratic factions denounce the vanguardists for disrespecting the will of the people. The facade of the socialist republic is crumbling, and first reports of political violence in the streets of $CAPITAL$ are coming in. Analysts agree that another such incident would break apart the socialist republic.
The Collapse of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Socialist Bloc

Polling stations closed and the count has been halted, after the vanguardists officially dissolved the socialist bloc and thus cancelled the election over disputes with the moderates have reached a boiling point, while there has been growing speculation that popular rivals from reactionary circles and within the own bloc declared they would contest the polls with their own lists, if the elections were to be won by the vanguardists. With the total collapse of the ruling unity party, the streets of $COUNTRY$ are filled with political violence against the perceived injustice from all sides, the young socialist republic seems to meet its end sooner rather than later...

After a string of cancelled elections and the collapse of cohesion within the ruling amalgamation of various socialist political organizations, the radical vanguardists have taken the matters into their own hands and have stormed the streets of $CAPITAL$ to purge the moderate factions! Many, however, escaped, and started to organize a united front with factions within the military and more reactionary parties to reestablish a true democracy after the experiences made with failed attempt at a socialist republic. Whether the coup will succeed will be decided in the coming hours in the streets of $CAPITAL$, at the cost of those idealists who believed that the socialist revolution has already succeeded...
Though traitors sneer, we'll keep the red flag flying here!
The United Front succeeds! Three hurrahs for true democracy!
$COUNTRY$ is undergoing turmoil as the totalitarian regime that had once maintained stability has been undermined by occupation, or bankruptcy.

The monarch has successfully removed the extremists plaguing this country but doing so has lead to some serious consequences. The military is effectively rendered worthless after several internal purges and our streets are now filled with the corpses of the ones who refused to obey the decree of the monarch. Only time will tell if $COUNTRY$ ever recovers from this.

All men, inasmuch as they are not liberated from the bondage of Time follow the downward path of history. Royalists will decry it, and reactionaries will fight it, but the cause of the Great German Revolution lives on as proven by the success of $COUNTRY$ in establishing itself in a hostile environment. In time, the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ values of equality in brotherhood have evolved into a shining beacon for other countries who share these ideals in Europe which will force the aristocrats of a bygone age to recognise that their stubborn isolation and hostility of their empires is not sustainable in an industrialising world.

The country has reached a tipping point. With civil strife and disorder being the norm, the fascists in government have been given full powers by our head of state to restore order and calm to the country. Such 'power' comes with a great deal of responsibility - and the likelihood of a potential takeover by such power-hungry personalities is undeniably high.

Following the emergence of the "Red Threat" of socialism and communism threatening to rip our country apart, the current government has given judicial and executive level provisions and exemptions to fascist agitators and personalities in an effort to stem the “Red Tide”. Fascist sentiments among the populace are growing slowly at a rapid pace, every move of theirs drawing ever closer to an imminent climax.

Our nation lies at the peak of power, the strongest and most powerful nation in the world. The civil service is efficient, the power of our banks dominant in other nations and our people prosperous. No other nation can seek to reach our levels of prosperity
column3: nor challenge us in open war or else face the wrath of the financial power and military might we hold.

column2: As the success of $COUNTRY$ and its republican values despite the hostile royalist environment weakens the cause of the reactionary forces of Europe immensely, the Great German Revolution of the last century seems to have redeemed itself after all: The curious $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Republics' policies are now focused on alleviating other liberal nations of Europe from the hardships of blockade and sanction against the yoke of those who use their power to preserve the status quo of the Treaty of Paris of 1820. Thus, at last, the dawn of a new age of diplomacy where nations conduct trade not based on ideology only shines through the many borders of Europe.

The independence of our noble $COUNTRY$ does not exist on paper, and our nation is fully dependent on $OVERLORD$, and all power in our country lies with them. We still, however, have some autonomy remaining over our internal affairs.
We must accept this for now...

While our nation was previously under the heel of our oppressors, our affairs being decided by men in a far off land, this is no longer the case. Now $COUNTRY$ has cast off her shackles, and our political centre lays firmly in $CAPITAL$. This is truly a great day for our people.

The destruction of the reactionary government has led to the end of its colonial projects. Across the world, the native proletariat so long oppressed by the regime directed by the bureaucrats of $CAPITAL$ are rising up agsinst the old order. We now face a choice. There are hardliners within our regime who believe that these people are not ready to implement socialism without our guidance, and that these uprisings are manifestations of local reactionary tendencies. Others believe that we must negotiate with indigenous communities and create new socialist states governed by the native proletariat in order to create a more equitable society.
We must bring the revolution across the world!
Their civilizations are net yet prepared for socialism.

A minority group in our government - "fascists" as the rogue publications like to call them - is gradually gaining momentum. Due to our current woes - whether it'd be foreign or domestic, trying to clamp down on them seems the most impossible. To our shock - one of them approached us with the proposition of an "alliance" - a "helping hand" to ease these woes. Should we agree to such a deal?
Approve it - What could ever go wrong
No. We have no use for rascals

The inevitable has occurred. Various thoroughfares in the capital have been barricaded by Fascist sympathizers - both military and common folk, giving it an eerie appearance of being under siege. Numerous figures have either disappeared or have been found dead in various places. Our government is paralyzed and the populace aghast upon witnessing this travesty. Meanwhile, on the radio, our dear $MONARCHTITLE$ has been hastily preparing a  speech to the nation, proving to be decisive given the moment, with the memorable words:
...We shall stop this menace, once and for all.

A lot of politicians in our legislature have always been at edge with the Reds, always ever threatening to lock up any piece of legislation they seem not fit. Many of our parliamentarians, as expected, are ever worried by the Red threat. Seemingly enough, our hardliner members have proposed a coalition agreement with the Fascists - alongside giving them "special privileges" in judicial and state affairs, in the light of our country's current struggles - to end this menace once and for all. If such "popular fronts" proved relatively popular among the sycophantic Reds, wouldn't it hurt to have ours too?
Futile times need strong measures. We accept.
...and allow them to take over the government. No deal.

Our recent policy of allowing fascist groups a free hand has borne fruit. The news media reports that countless leftist, liberal and even conservative personalities in our country have been attacked, harassed, and even killed by fascist paramilitaries. These so called "death squads" have been very effective in stifling the Left, and by extension are crucial in the further entrenchment of fascist power.
At least they are effective at resolving the socialist problem.

Fascist paramilitaries in $CAPITAL$ and other various major cities in $COUNTRY$ have been hard at work trying to spread their rhetoric to the common folk. Be it radio, print media, or even word of mouth, many Fascist volunteers have begun to spread the word of their cause, even resorting to extrajudicial and sinister means. Due to our policies, stopping them any further seems impossible.
This is getting out of hand.

It was during the early morning of $DATE_LONG_0$ when the capital city of $CAPITAL$ was awoken to a loud, crackling bang. Many have been reported injured (and even presumed dead), and several national government buildings have been damaged beyond repair and are in flames. The attackers, mysteriously, were seemingly apprehended a couple of hours after the attack, with identity documents showing that they are Communist paramilitaries, aiming to overthrow the government. Our Fascist allies, as usual, have quickly sprung forth to action and demanded immediate emergency powers and mandates to "restore calm". How should we respond?
I've had enough - Kick them out.

Time has proven to be the Fascist's worst enemy. Either it'd be due to our present government policies that explicitly forbid these kinds of parties from ever forming or a clause in our Constitution that prohibits them from ever doing so irregardless of any progress they have made to undermine and subvert our government.

With the resounding victory of a couple of "anti-fascist" parties in government that aim to stifle the fascist threat in our country, it that many of the fascist agitators in our government and among the populace were forced to go to hiding due to fear of reprisals or the sudden tide of public opinion going against them. Coupled with the $MONARCHTITLE$'s orders that repealed the laws that gave Fascist personalities free reign over public and state affairs, it seems that the fascist scum have met their doom... Hopefully.
The people united will never be defeated.

Foreign observers are at shock as $COUNTRY_ADJ$ fascist paramilitaries and supporters have staged a "special political operation" in the capital city of $CAPITAL$ as reaction to a recent electoral victory of an assortment of anti-fascist parties. Many analysts have pointed out that prior to these events the tense political climate in $COUNTRY$, along with the past government's prior policies that have favored the fascists, has accommodated to the gradual fomenting of fascist sentiment among $COUNTRY_ADJ$ citizens. Hours after the coup, many anti-fascist & opposition leaders have begun fleeing from the country, contemplating on establishing a government-in-exile. Foreign leaders from all sides on the other hand, have both welcomed and ridiculed this development.
We shall purge the Blanquist nightmare. Glory to $COUNTRY$!

Foreign observers are in shock as $COUNTRY_ADJ$ fascists, assumed total control of the country. Relentless efforts of cementing their power either due to a combination of electoral successes, immense popular support, or both are the leading reasons for such an occurrence. Critics have pointed out though, that previous government policies have loosened restrictions or gave concessions to fascist groups, proving a turning point in light of these events. Hours after the coup, many anti-fascist & opposition leaders have begun fleeing from the country, contemplating on establishing a government-in-exile. Foreign leaders from all sides on the other hand, have both welcomed and ridiculed this development.
A glorious day for our country!

After a massive targeted terror attack by presumably Blanquist agitators in the capital of $COUNTRY$, the fascists have announced their intention to lead a "temporary caretaker government" - immediately suspending habeas corpus and announcing major restrictions on civil liberties as an effort to restore order and stability in the country. Political analysts and antifascist leaning critics alike have likened this as a ruse to further cement Fascist control in the country - allowing for the gradual stifling of civil rights and policies that further the formation of a totalitarian state. Hours after the coup, many anti-fascist & opposition leaders have begun fleeing from the country, contemplating on establishing a government-in-exile. Foreign leaders from all sides on the other hand, have both welcomed and ridiculed this development.
We shall purge the Blanquist nightmare. Glory to $COUNTRY$!

Upon the passing of the $MONARCHTITLE$ of $COUNTRY$, their valiant fascist allies in parliament have simultaneously expressed their condolences and sprung up to action planning to put the colloquial termed "Enabling Act" into motion, a trigger law with provisions that allow the fascist party to (1) irrevocably assume of all State functionaries, (2) becoming the sole legal party in government, and (3) enact laws without the $MONARCHTITLE$ consent. However with the passing of the $MONARCHTITLE$, the Head of Government has seized this initiative to assume full control of the government paving the way for a novel and potentially resurgent totalitarian state. Hours after this siezure of power, many anti-fascist & opposition leaders have begun fleeing from the country, contemplating on establishing a government-in-exile. Foreign leaders from all sides on the other hand, have both welcomed and ridiculed this development.
I did not see that coming!

By royal decree, our dear $MONARCHTITLE$ has promulgated the Declaration of $YEAR$, aiming to save our realm in distress. The $MONARCHTITLE$ has permitted the fascists to assume power, in light of current struggles both at home and abroad for the betterment of the $MONARCHTITLE$'s most serene subjects. Notwithstanding the dangers of foreign opposition and the repugnant ramblings of Blanquist scum, we have prevailed ever victorious in this fusion of an empowered State with the $MONARCHTITLE$ at its helm. With the immediate, forceful dissolution of parliament as per royal decree, the leader of the Fascist party has begun formulating their plans to restore the Fatherland to its greatness and to subdue all Her enemies who threaten to sneer or mock this new valiant and great course. Long Live the $MONARCHTITLE$! Glory to the Fascist cause! May the accursed spawn of Satan- Communism, that is, be torn into pieces!”\n\n- The Royal $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Bulletin, $DATE_LONG_0$
One nation to rule them all!

Our nation is the leading power on the globe. The military might of our armed forces is feared upon distance shores whilst our industrial base is the bedrock of the world’s economy. No one dares question our might nor challenges our interests abroad due to the sheer economic and military power we now wield. This new state of affairs we now reside in has ushered a new age of prosperity for our people.\n\nHowever there are other powers who grow jealous of our economic and sociopolitical supremacy over the world, we must guard our boon of prosperity, otherwise this era of light we have emerged into through blood, sweat and tears, might set upon us as rapidly as it has dawned.
The Leader of the Free World

Democracy has a new champion in $COUNTRY$! From the streets of $CAPITAL$ to our furthest frontiers, the blazing torch of liberty illuminates all. Foreign tyrants fear our righteous retribution for their crimes against humanity, while the oppressed masses of the world look to our nation as a beacon of freedom. Ours is a land where anybody can prosper, and which shall always enter battle on the side of the underdog. The free societies of the world draw upon our institutions for inspiration, and even their artists and authors take up our motifs. $COUNTRY$ is more than a great power - she is the leader of the free world.
The Leader of the World Revolution

Socialism has a new hero in $COUNTRY$! From the factories of $CAPITAL$ to our furthest hinterlands, the shining light of Blanquism lights the path towards utopia. The bourgeoisie fear the coming of our Red Army to liberate their proletarians, while the workers and peasants of the world look to our nation as proof that Blanquism is both possible and alive. Ours is a land where the chains of capital have been broken, and which shall never waver in our quest for the Socialist World Republic that will unite all of humanity. Leftist organizations, even those who disagree with our precise doctrine, draw upon the history of our party for inspiration, and their artists and poets take up our motifs. $COUNTRY$ is more than a great power - we are the leader of the world revolution!
Shining in glory for all to see!
The Leader of the New Order

The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ master race have found their warrior in $COUNTRY$! From the streets of $CAPITAL$ to savage lands yet untamed, the glorious radiance of our superiority leaves nothing untouched. The cosmopolitans dread our destruction of their pitiful excuses for civilizations, while fellow superior cultures look to our nation as a program for their own strength. Our is a land where the ways of the past have been seamlessly wed to the technology of the future, and which shall cast the lies of the old world down to forge a new one in our image. Those who share in our knowledge of truth flatter us by imitating our ways, and their propaganda is but an echo of our own. $COUNTRY$ is more than a great power - she is the leader of the new order.
$COUNTRY$ shall endure for a thousand years!

Our time as the world’s sole hegemon is lost. The glory we once had has shifted onto another and the age of prosperity which many lived in is now gone. Now the older generation remember our previous years as the ‘good ole days’, never to return. The days when we were the superpower, the global policeman of the world is now gone. Our military might has degraded, the surety of our economic system and political governance now challenged from abroad and within. The winds of change have occurred and now we stand in the shadow of lost glory.

The continuous victories of socialist parties in recent elections has demonstrated a popular mandate for the left, but its vision remains undefined. For some, leftism is not merely an ideology, but the inevitable path of humanity into a brighter future. In the name of doctrinal clarity, leading leftist ideologists have gathered in $CAPITAL$ for a congress to determine the future of the movement. The congress must decide : should the left embrace a fully revolutionary bent, endorsing Internationalist Socialism, the overthrow of international capital, and the unification of mankind under the red flag - even if it means the purging of reactionary elements upon taking power? Or should the left instead endorse Social Democracy, working within the preexisting system of our nation and aim for steady reform? Is there only one path to utopia?
Yes, and it will come through the Internationalists and revolution!
Yes, and it will come through Social Democracy and reform!

And that was it. Another reform was passed and nobody in the crowd seemed to disagree, because anyone who did was drowned by the cheers of the multitude. With that, they accepted their defeat and enjoyed the fruits of our victory. We didn't even need to expand our ideals by force, because we only had to prove our point to make others want to follow our example. Our recent reforms, providing an expansive social safety net and widespread economic security to the vast majority of our citizens, have smothered the flames of Internationalist Socialism. There are those who said that utopia was unreachable, but now we have proven them wrong. A utopia is possible. It already exists. We, the Social Democracy, are the utopia.

The Social Liberals were always unwilling partners with the Internationalist Socialists. Preferring reform and the expansion of social programs and democracy to throwing bombs and assassinating officials, the Social Liberals worked with the Internationalists only as a matter of necessity. Now, with the Social Liberals' recent electoral dominance, they have cut the Internationalists loose. By controlling the legislative and executive branches, they now stand unchallenged, able to change the nation as they see fit. The Internationalists, weak and incapable, their radical ideology discredited in the eyes of all but the most fanatical believers, are forced to comply. The future of the left, at least in $COUNTRY$, lies in moderate democracy.

Despite their best efforts, the Social Democrats of $COUNTRY$ have been entirely discredited. Now crowds have filled $CAPITAL$, enraged at our failures. Many have joined beneath the banner of Internationalism and Communism, declaring social democracy to be rife with weakness and politically bankrupt. Now they want a new strategy : world revolution towards the Socialist World Republic, the promised era when socialism is triumphant not just in $COUNTRY$ but across the Earth. However, the reactionaries also oppose the Communist cause, and we could partner with rightist parties and their paramilitary forces to crush the Internationalists. This would be a desperate act, one which would go down in the annals of leftist history as an eternal and unforgivable betrayal. But if we wish for $COUNTRY$ to take any path other than committing to the liberation of the world’s millions of proletarians by peace or force, then we have no other choice.
We belong here, in power, even if by rightist bayonets.
We belong out there, in the streets, with the Revolution!

A knock on your door at midnight. A dose of poison in your drink. A pistol shot as you walk down the street. The anti-Communist purge could take any form.\n\nWe have done the unthinkable, partnering with the reactionaries to crush the revolution. The streets are quiet, aside from the faint smoldering of half-quenched fires, the occasional shattering of already broken glass, and the jackboots of rightist paramilitaries. The Internationalists are in full retreat, their leadership dead, under arrest, or in exile. Any semblance of leftist unity has been destroyed. Already, recriminations are beginning within Social Democratic circles over what has been done. Time will tell if the empowered right will turn against us. For now, our nation is coming to grips with a new chapter in its history, as pluralism and socialism become increasingly discredited in the eyes of the general public.
A Red-Brown Alliance can only end one way.

The communist uprisings and the resulting government purges have both begun to fade from the public consciousness. The scars in the memory of the people have healed enough that some politicians are considering allowing the Communists to once again participate in elections. Old guard politicians and members of the police and military dismiss them as naive fools, but few remember the turmoil which $COUNTRY$ faced during its aborted revolution. We also suspect some of the new generation of political leaders have radical sympathies : but times have changed, and taking aggressive measures against them will only hurt our image. It is unfortunate then that we expect the anti-communist laws to be repealed with a resounding majority.
They will regret this soon enough.

Our partnership with the Internationalists was always going to come with a catch, and now, unfortunately, it is time to pay the piper. The Internationalists assert that the recent crises plaguing our nation have one cause : the perfidious forces of reaction. Indeed, the Internationalists have gone so far as to suggest that to save socialism we must destroy our reactionary enemies before they destroy us. As such, they have proposed a rash of reforms with the ultimate goal of forcing all non-socialist parties underground. We could go along with this proposal, with the result being the end of democracy in our nation. On the other hand, we could refuse the Internationalists, though this would almost certainly result in a general strike.
Tell the Internationalists that they have gone too far.

The Monarch has declared the Constituent Assembly, and by extension the government, illegitimate. He argues that the attempt of the Representatives to do away with the monarchy without a public referendum is unconstitutional and proves that the Government is uninterested in listening to the voices of the people. Thus he has rallied a cabal of right wing officers, mainline politicians, and even some moderate socialists around him in order to put a stop to the revolution! Meanwhile, communist militias have been summoned to the capital to defend us from the march of this “White Army.” Both forces seem evenly matched, and the resulting battle could go either way…
The Red Army crushes the Whites and saves the Revolution!
The White Army routs the Reds and saves the Monarchy!

The locals gather at the harbor on a beautiful morning, as a ship in the distance disappears over the horizon. One passenger - the former $MONARCHTITLE$ of $COUNTRY$, now bereft of all his possessions save the clothes he wears - was not allowed to board, pulled out of the line and sent to a reeducation center like all of the other common reactionaries. The ship departs, and the people return to their new reality. It is a reality of socialism, one of welfare and equality. Inside one of the rooms of the palace, Communist Party officials and generals examine a map of the nation, festooned with notes, drawings, and pictures of strategic points, enemies of the state and rebel groups. They discuss foreign policy, national security, and economic development. This new period will be one of wild and wondrous change, as we continue to fight to unite the human race. Victory shall bring nothing less than the Socialist World Republic. Eventually, it will all be worth it.
Soon, all the workers around the globe shall bear the same flag!
The Awakening of the Sleeping Giant

The Communist Party of $COUNTRY$ is in an uproar over a message from the socialists. They declare that they have abandoned plans to rewrite the constitution, a plan popular with the Communists though criticized by more moderate leftists. The goal was to establish communism without discarding democracy. But unlike the moderate socialists, the communists have no qualms about revolutionary violence. Given this “blatant and heartless betrayal,” as they put it, the Communists are locked in debate over whether to attempt an armed revolt to seize power and avert a drawn-out conflict which might lead to civil war or worse, the destruction of their party. The socialists, aware of the impending communist insurrection, have mobilized the authorities to arrest major communist figures, but those attempts may not be enough to stop the sleeping giant of the Communists’ legions of workers and peasants from rising up with their leaders..
This is a democracy, we only follow the will of the people.
That's it! Take your rifles, comrades! To victory!

”Let the ruling classes tremble at a Communist revolution. The proletarians have nothing to lose but their chains. They have a world to win. Workers of the world, unite!” - Cornelius Blanqui\nThe doors blast open, as the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Red Army swoops down upon the helpless politicians hiding within. As the prisoners march out, they hear echoes of gunfire, see the parliament’s steps splattered with blood, and realize their captors are the same peasants and factory workers they once scorned. The old head of state has vanished, and the red flag now waves over their palace, prideful above the ruins of the old order. Leftist revolutionaries, bolstered by defectors from the Altes Regime, have triumphed, and the forces of reaction are in full retreat. The jails of $COUNTRY$ are crammed with "enemies of the revolution" awaiting trial, while industries are nationalized and new social programs created. Blanqui’s dreams have leapt from the pages of the Communist Manifesto and into reality, as the red star rises over $CAPITAL$.
Vive la révolution! HURRAH! HURRAH! HURRAH!

The alliance between the Social Democrats and the Internationalists was always one of convenience. Now, that alliance has broken down. The Social Democrats have managed, through ballot and bullet, with or without rightist agents, to suppress the Communists. Internationalist socialism within $COUNTRY$, and leftist unity writ large, is in chaos. $COUNTRY_ADJ$ leftists,, however, are unlikely to either forget or forgive this betrayal anytime soon.
Our government has adopted several provisions excluding the far left and the far right from participating in politics, in the name of keeping the nation safe.

The old order has been cast down! With the victory of the revolution, a council of revolutionaries from across the political spectrum has been assembled into the $COUNTRY_AD$ Directory in $CAPITAL$. There they will oversee the political reorganization of our nation. Some have criticized the structure of the provisional government as being insufficiently democratic, but the councilors have stressed the need for freedom of action to defend against counter-revolutionaries. At the moment, the moderates have taken control of the assembly, but their grasp is tenuous, and political extremists on both the left and the right could make plays for power in the coming days.  For now however all segments of our society - except for the old regime’s fanatics - seek to build our new nation and shape its future, a future that is now beautifully unpredictable.
Together we shall bring forth a new era!

Loyalists of the old regime remain throughout our society, as well as in emigrant communities abroad. Even now, they may be working against us. Several incidents of loyalists spreading propaganda or plotting rebellion in the name of the previous government have already been reported. Some councilors of the provisional government are now convinced that we must declare a state of emergency in order to suppress these threats as well as to maintain military readiness in case of foreign invasion. After all, they argue, did not Marinus Dahlke, the archetypical revolutionary, introduce extraordinary police powers to protect against both domestic intrigue and the attacks from foreign regimes? Other councilors have countered that Dahlke failed precisely because he became the same sort of tyrant which he had opposed. A vote is now being held to introduce broad powers of censorship and political control in $COUNTRY$...
The bill is adopted as a necessary evil.
Those who trade liberty for safety deserve neither and lose both!

While the previous monarch of $COUNTRY$ was forced from power, their dynasty has not actually relinquished their claim to the throne, nor has the monarchy itself been legally abolished. At present it is dormant - yet still lingers. Many councilors in the provisional government are now pushing to officially abolish the monarchy. Monarchism, they say, is an inherently oppressive form of government in which society is stratified, innovation is stifled in the name of tradition, and some citizens are held as superior to others - to say nothing of the financial burden of maintaining the Crown and the nobility. However, a vocal minority sees the monarchy as a useful political tool. They argue that we merely need to strip all political and economic powers from the monarchy, whereupon we can use it to support our new government - and deny the monarchists a martyr to rally around.
The monarchy may endure as a ceremonial institution.
The time has come for a republic!
The Question of the Head of State

One of the grievances of many revolutionaries was the major role of the executive branch in the previous government. Time and time again, it is argued, the head of state’s power blocked the will of the people and forced through unpopular measures. Many councilors demand that the provisional government either reduce the executive branch to a ceremonial status or at least assign its most dangerous powers to the hands of the legislature, where they are less likely to be used without cause. However this proposal has drawn fire from those who charge that the councilors, assuming that they will compose our new legislature, are merely hoarding power for themselves. Others have pointed out instances in our history where the head of state overcame obstruction by the legislature to the nation’s benefit. Two constitutional provisions have been drafted, one with a strong executive, and one without, but only one can be adopted…
The power of the head of state must be maintained.
We cannot allow an imperial executive branch!
The Question of the Head of State

One of the grievances of many revolutionaries was the minor role of the executive branch in the previous government. Time and time again, it is argued, the head of state’s weakness allowed the legislature to block the will of the people and force through unpopular measures. Many councilors demand that the provisional government strengthen the executive branch to be able to balance the legislature. However this proposal has drawn fire from other councilors who fear that this could lead to the head of state becoming tyrannical. Others have pointed out that the legislature was given power precisely because of previous points in our history where autocratic rulers had no restraints. Two constitutional provisions have been drafted, one with a strong executive, and one without, but only one can be adopted…
We cannot allow an imperial executive branch!
The power of the head of state must match the legislature.

The continued presence of loyalists to the old regime - or dissident radicals who refuse to cooperate with the provisional government - in $COUNTRY$ has stirred some councilors to propose new security measures. These have involved the creation of a special, national police organization which would conduct clandestine operations against enemies of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people. It has also been argued that such an agency would be a useful defense against foreign subversion of the revolution. However, other councilors have protested that these organizations are quite similar to those employed by the old regime to hunt the types of people who now staff our provisional government. As such they denounce the idea of a secret police organization as inherently oppressive.
It is needed to fight extremism
We would be just as immoral as the old regime!

The provisional government is an ostensible alliance of all members of the dissident spectrum. With that being said, there are certain members of the fringe left and right which many councilors do not wish to allow into the halls of power. Therefore it has been suggested to adopt certain anti-radical provisions. Given the militancy and ruthlessness of some extremist factions, this measure might be a necessary safety precaution for our nation. However it has been severely criticized even by councilors in the political center, who decry placing hard limits on political freedom within $COUNTRY$. So long as a party does not seek to restore the old regime or destroy the state, they argue, they have no reason to be excluded from government.
We cannot allow extremists to take advantage of our constitution.
Liberty for everyone or for no one!

The socialist parties have made repeated pushes for the end of military conscription. They have denounced this system for forcing innocent citizens to sacrifice life and limb at the whims of the government, while also noting that conscription disproportionately affects the lower classes who cannot afford to evade it, something which is often done by wealthier citizens. They argue instead that conscription should be made an emergency measure only to be used during wartime. Other councilors have accused the socialist parties of weakening the nation, protesting that conscription is necessary to protect the revolution against hostile foreign regimes.
We must cease forcing our citizenry onto the battlefield!
The strength of the armed forces must be maintained.

The Directory has assembled quite a lot of power as of late. In the course of its existence, it has used this power to target those who sought to oust it from power or replace it with a rival institution. As the power of the Directory continues to entrench itself, fewer and fewer organizations are left to oppose it. Now some councilors are aiming to have the Directory’s control of society made permanent! In an anonymous pamphlet being circulated by the plotters, they declared that the revolution’s success must be shepherded by its creators. We believe that we have identified several councilors and military officers conspiring towards such ends. Arresting them and their sympathizers could put an end to this danger, unless they manage to strike first…

The provisional government was dissolved this morning, pending the election of our new government. The new constitution which it created will hopefully protect the rights of our people and guide us towards a nation greater than that of the old regime. In the course of its existence the provisional government withstood both foreign pressures and domestic intrigues, yet refused to waver from its commitment to democracy.

Whether by the ballot or the bullet, the Directory has lost its power, overcome by the political forces of its rivals. The political changes which it wrought are being undone, and its legacy is now in question. The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ future is once again in question, and nobody can say which group will rise to fill their vacuum.
May our nation find unity once more.

The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ constitution possesses several restrictions which in theory prevent an extremist political party from taking power. Despite these measures, a radical party - located either on the left or the right - has now managed to form a new government. Their first priority was to pass a new constitutional amendment which has eliminated previous restrictions on political activity. This has opened the door to a surge in activism by parties of all stripes, though naturally the administration has supported their allies above all. Yet the reverberations of this change will be felt for generations to come, as a new era of wild politics in $COUNTRY$ is inaugurated.

Our laws restricting public activity by certain forms of political parties expired this morning when a vote to renew them failed in the legislature. Multiple politicians argued that the provisions were no longer necessary, given the stability of the nation. These views were criticized by other officials who chided their opposite numbers for confusing the results of the restrictions with lack of a need for them. They have prophesied that ending the anti-radical laws will spread chaos throughout $COUNTRY$. It seems that only time will tell if the are right.
Liberty, for better or for worse.

Our control over the Central Pacific has put us in a special position to allow us to project our naval power throughout the entire Pacific Ocean. This will not only bring us prestige, but also give us an edge in trade throughout the region. Naturally we will have to increase our investments in our navy in order to ensure that our naval forces are up to the task of protecting our new thalassocracy. Naval training will become more rigorous to separate the wheat from the chaff, sailors will be expected to work harder, but in exchange they will reap the glory of being a part of our grand navy. This may harm our research into our armed forces, but sacrifices must be made for the glory of our nation.
Hegemon of the North Atlantic Ocean

With the recent changes of the balance of power in Europe, we now find ourselves in a position to become the preeminent power over the Northern Atlantic Ocean. This will not only bring us prestige, but also give us an edge in trade throughout the region.  Naturally we will have to increase our investments in our navy in order to ensure that our naval forces are up to the task of protecting our new thalassocracy. Naval training will become more rigorous to separate the wheat from the chaff, sailors will be expected to work harder, but in exchange they will reap the glory of being a part of our grand navy. This may harm our research into our armed forces, but sacrifices must be made for the glory of our nation.
The End of our Pacific Thalassocracy

With Kaigan and Hawaii falling under the control of a singular power we are forced to admit that we are no longer in a position to enforce our Thalassocracy over the Pacific. Without the need to maintain our naval superiority we have already begun scaling back our investments in the navy, and its once prestigious position within our nation has begun to erode. If we wish to reclaim our thalassocracy we will need to secure control over Kaigan and Hawaii. Until then we can only dream of the days when we ruled the waves.
Was it foolish to think we could rule the seas?
The End of our Atlantic Thalassocracy

With the change of control over the Scottish Lowlands we are forced to admit that we are no longer in a position to enforce our Thalassocracy over the Northern Atlantic. Without the need to maintain our naval superiority we have already begun scaling back our investments in the navy, and its once prestigious position within our nation has begun to erode. If we wish to reclaim our thalassocracy we would need to bring the lowlands back under our influence. Until then we can only dream of the days when we ruled the waves.
Was it foolish to think we could rule the seas?

Thalassocracy, comes from a Greek word, meaning rule of the sea. Our position within the Northern Atlantic effectively allows us to project our power and control ship routes throughout much of the Atlantic Ocean. In order to maintain this state of affairs the navy has been given a prominent place in our society with many in our nation wishing to join the navy or in some way contribute towards the superiority of our fleet. §RHowever, should the Scottish Lowlands fall under the control of another Great Power we will be forced to renounce our Atlantic Thalassocracy, possibly allowing one of our rivals to take up the mantle of Atlantic Hegemon§!

Thalassocracy, comes from a Greek word, meaning rule of the sea. Our position within the Pacific effectively allows us to project our power and control ship routes throughout much of the Pacific Ocean. In order to maintain this state of affairs the navy has been given a prominent place in our society with many in our nation wishing to join the navy or in some way contribute towards the superiority of our fleet. §RHowever, should both Kaigan and Hawaii fall under the control of another Great Power we will be forced to renounce our Pacific Thalassocracy, possibly allowing one of our rivals to take up the mantle of Pacific Hegemon§!

The Consolidation of the Burgundian Kingdom after the War on the Rhine and the subsequent Treaty of Frankfurt of 1498 meant that the left bank of the Rhine river slipped out of the control of the various local prince-bishoprics and counties for next centuries. Ever since then, this humiliation was attempted to be reversed by the various Jagiellon emperors, and Bohemia would crush the Burgundian army in the Grand Battle of Mainz of 1812 during the Great German War which humiliated Burgundy, granting Bohemia occupation of Alsace and the Confederation of the Rhine. This was reversed in the final Peace of Paris of 1820, however, and Prague has been longing for the Rhineland ever since. Now, the time has come to reclaim the lands once and for all from the hands of Burgundy and for the sacrifice of Wenceslaus V!

Germany is now fully unified but the problem of Bohemia is still there. Prague sits in the middle of the German lands and the hardcore nationalists call for the same treatment that the German nation received from Prague with the total occupation of the country along with all other known German lands in Europe. They are a minority, most of the complaints being about Silesia. The densely populated and industrialized region has many Germans around Breslau and Lower Silesia, making part of the Greater German Nation. Some also call for the annexation of whole Silesia, but most of the territories in the South are populated by Poles and Czechs. Of course all groups can agree that Saxony should be the primary target of any invasion into Bohemia if we somehow do not own it already and even the most pacifistic will not stand for the continued occupation of Saxony by the Bohemians.
Saxony first, if we don't already own it of course.
We'll claim Lower Silesia, alongside Saxony
We'll claim all of Silesia, alongside Saxony
We will claim ALL German land!
We are in the correct position to finally claim Prussia as a legitimate conquest of $COUNTRY$.

The Selon Treaty has granted specific protections to Asian Nations that prevents rapid-fire conquest of our territory. This has resulted in stagnation for the entire continent and no real effort to "civilize" is being taken by anyone with the sheer exception of Japan.

The Treaty of Selon was signed by Burgundy, Spain, England-France and Scandinavia in the 18th Century, guaranteeing peaceful and trade-oriented development of European power projection in the Far East. This very treaty ensures that Asian nations cannot be directly attacked or turned into protectorates by European nations and has resulted in a sense of peace and security from European interests. This has resulted in a lack of care to "civilize" by almost all Asian nations with the exceptions of both Japan and Korea and may result in future foreign policy disasters..

The Treaty of Selon has been abolished and whatever protections that it granted over Asian Nations has gone with it. A sense of panic has erupted in $COUNTRY$ as many officials have already concluded that our inability to civilize due to the existence of this extremely valuable treaty will leave us open to attack by European Nations. India, of course has it far worse as hungry eyes look towards the opulence of the subcontinent and its enduring chaos that can be easily explored for easy protectorates.

Our sphere master either has cultural minorities or well justified claims over a portion of our territory. However they came about these claims is unknown but it has been creating some serious border tension recently. Today, there was a serious border incident involving several of their soldiers and ours. Our sphere master has already withdrawn its embassy and is likely to attempt to reaffirm its claims by force.

One of our sphere members has killed several of our soldiers in a unjustified attack on our border outpost. As we have several claims on their territory, the tensions in these "cores" have only continued to increase beyond that of having a ability to actually maintain our sphere over this country. Additionally, many cry out for us to crush their army to prove that we are able to take our rightful territory back and we are not too pacifist to have any reasonable stake as a world power.

Representatives from several nations that border to the Holy Roman Empire have met today to discuss the Bohemian Civil War and they have concluded that this is the sole opportunity that they will have to restore the balance in Central Europe. The far majority of delegates have agreed to involve themselves in this war but it is ultimately up to the leadership of each nation to decide if they want to join this war or not.
We like licking the boots of a superpower.
Collapse of the Holy Roman Empire

With the declaration of a democratic republic, the Holy Roman Empire ceases to exist and rather in its place stands a new German Nation. Bohemia, of course after the previous Bohemian Revolt naturally refuses to remain part of this new federation and has rather gathered around the old Bohemian Monarchy and declared the Kingdom of Bohemia once again. As we must respect the results of the referendum in their territories and as we are a democratic republic : we must let them go. Let the German Eagle rise!
Collapse of the Holy Roman Empire
With the permanent loss of Bohemia, the Holy Roman Empire has been abolished and in its place stands a new German Nation. Let the German Eagle rise!

With our inability to recover our imperial lands before the Springtime of Nations, we have been left in a situation where we are unable to recover the German territories that should be in our control and not Scandinavia due to international laws. However, there are some in our government who feel that we should just ignore international laws and claim it under whatever is left of the crown of the Holy Roman Empire regardless.

It is unacceptable that another nation is permitted to build a canal with the purposes of giving a alternative path into the Baltic Sea. Under the risk of having our potential Baltic Trade damaged, they force our hand and we are forced to take a effort to seize the canal zone for ourselves!

Plan B has ended in a smashing success! Scandinavia has been thrown out of Germany and we have come as liberators rather then conquerors. However, our ability to keep this territory may be limited by the fact that we are currently still the Kingdom of Bohemia. If we were to form some form of Confederation between the Elbian states that may change, but as it currently stands we are not permitted to keep our claims over the territory (nor is Scandinavia either for that matter)...
Due to circumstance unforeseen, we have fell to a liberal democratic revolt too soon after we had attained power in Istanbul. This must be remedied!

The concept of a Greater Turania which includes territories that are now a part of the new Chinese conquests has been time and time again proven to be a utter impossibility that only a madman would dream of. So we shall limit ourselves to a state of Turkmen, Kyrgyz, Tajiks and Uzbeks that can be united into the concept of a Lesser Turania.

The various cultures of Central Asia would serve us better if they were united as one nation. The fledgling nationalism of these peoples, oftentimes part of nomadic tribes, is something of a recent and small phenomenon. Therefore the people shouldn't oppose the creation of Turania and their inclusion in this nation. The local elites may protest such a move, but guaranteeing them a share of power in the new country will silence the vast majority of the potential troublemakers.

The Danubian Federation and The Elbian League share the same agenda: the unification of Germany. Representatives from both states have argued about unifying the two leading forces of Germany into one. Should we make the proposal?
I don't think it's good for us ...
The Elbian are proposing us to unify our state which would basically be Germany unified. Do we accept the proposal ?
There are too much differences between us to consider unification...
The two German states have unified today, bringing much of Germany under their power. German unification will surely be completed soon.

The Unification of the Elbe seemed inevitable as the various leaders of the northern and western states of the former Holy Roman Empire joined together to sign the Elbian Treaty in Prague. However, this was not to be as the conference was sabotaged by a group of German nationalists disguising themselves as civilians in the crowds gathered to watch the ceremony and massacring hundreds of innocents. It is said that sheer amount of insults thrown by the various northern leaders after this colossal failure of a conference at both the Danubians and the $MONARCHTITLE$ of Bohemia has resulted in various leaders of the south declaring their intention to create a Kingdom of Germany, without Bohemia.

Our impenetrable alliance is only broken in two regions- one is in the Portuguese colonies of Lusitania and the other is the Native Amerigan nations of the South. The present and most bloody stage of this war has raged on since Eighteen-Twenty-Four and Lusitania has finally given up being friendly towards our cause and unilaterally declared a separate republic in the hope that if they defeat us then they shall not be annexed by Spain again. Deodoro Peixoto, the Lustanian Tetrarch has already disavowed his involvement with that movement and it is likely that this is the doing of rogue elements inside that region. Already there are rumours in the south of another potential revolt...
We will fight this rebellion and crush it.
We cannot fight this right now. Make a deal.

As was expected, the Inca of the south have broken off and unilaterally declared yet another separate independence in the hope that they will get their "Native Amerigan" independence away from the dictates of foreign rule.
We cannot fight a native revolt right now. Make a deal with at least the north.

Our deal with the rebellious Lusitania during the war has lead to a strengthening of the Independentists as a large portion of the population now agrees with the fact that any rebellion will not be punished.

Our deal with the rebellious Quito during the war has lead to a strengthening of the Granada Movement as they used their resources during their autonomous period to ensure that the Amerigans would be ruled from Ameriga.
The Spanish Empire has gone into terminal decline but they still own very valuable territory in Africa. Since we have effective control over Spain we could easily offer to purchase this territory.

$FROMCOUNTRY$ has come to us with a offer regarding our territories in Zanzibar. They will hand us a very large sum of money and we will give the Zanzibar territories to them. Since we have no influence on the world stage any more it is unlikely we will be actually able to use the territories so we might as well just give them away.

$COUNTRY$ still had a active regency council due to a inability of the new government to dissolve it for a short period of time. However, a small effort has been put forward by the new government to dissolve this regency council and now $COUNTRY$ does not have to deal with it any more.
$COUNTRY$ is now free from the Regency.
With our choice to maintain our capital in Mexico City, we have set in motion our intent to conquer territories that are north of our present borders.
With our choice to move our capital to Liberia, we have set in motion our intent to conquer territories that are south of our present borders.

When Spanish explorers had first discovered the coastline of what is know known as Qingqiu, they had claimed that a large amount of territory to the north of the Lusitanian colonies would be known as California. Unfortunately- as the Qingqiuian settlers had moved south they had done the same and made a bold claim that all territory to the south would be known as Shangu Siwang. After our previous wars and our proof that the Arcadian continent would not be exclusively the realm of the Arcadians, we have finally remedied this issue and can now claim that the land shall be forever more known as California!

The greatest failure of the Spanish Empire was when it had failed to successfully conquer the Incan Empire. After deals brokered with Beornia to conquer the south of the empire and our total invasion of the north, we have finally avenged the failures of the Spanish Empire and have destroyed the Inca menace!

With the completion of our glorious conquest and having secured our place as a great power, we can finally take the actions that are needed to restore the Republic of Granada away from its present military occupation.

With the completion of our glorious conquest and having secured our place as a great power, we can finally take the actions that are needed to restore the Republic of Lusitania away from its present military occupation.

As Gran Colombia nears its fiftieth anniversary, a fiery debate has started in our government regarding if Gran Colombia should move its capital or not. Granadan nationalists attending have stated that the capital should be moved to a far more appropriate location (in this case the city of Liberia) rather then remain in Mexico City and Lusitanian nationalists have stated that they will not tolerate any attempt to move the capital away from Mexico City..
We had plans for this anniversary, you know?

It has been fifty years since the foundation of the Tetrarchy that had reorganized the Colombian Alliance into a single unified nation. This nation had prevailed against both Spain and its own instabilities to become the single unified power it that it is today. However, there is now a critical concern that as the century continues our power is starting to decline and that the Inca and Arcadian powers will eventually surpass us. We must also be concerned at the growing nationalist movements in both Lusitania and Granada are threatening to tear our nation to pieces with the implicit agenda of deciding where our capital shall be located regardless of any potential compromise. We must choose where we stand on the idea of the capital moving and what our intent is regarding future expansion IMMEDIATLY or risk our potential collapse!
Keep the capital in Mexico City

The Republic of Granada had been taken over by nationalist forces today with the implicit desire of succession. The Colombian Military had proceeded with a operation to prevent this succession but this had effectively resulted in the collapse of the Republic of Granada and reduced our status in the region to nothing more then a military occupation. We may be eventually able to restore the Republic of Granada as a federal state but we will have to finish our plans in the north before attempting such a task.

The Republic of Lusitania had been taken over by nationalist forces today with the implicit desire of succession. The Colombian Military had proceeded with a operation to prevent this succession but this had effectively resulted in the collapse of the Republic of Lusitania and reduced our status in the region to nothing more then a military occupation. We may be eventually able to restore order in Republic of Lusitania as a federal state but we will have to finish our plans in the north before attempting such a task.

Gran Colombia has declared that it wishes to eliminate the Incan Empire and freely invites us to involve ourselves in this endeavour. We are free to take any land below the line designated as their claims.
The Phanariote Society has seized power over the state and installed a brutal dictatorship.

The Phanariote System is designed by the ruling class of the Ottoman Empire to crush all dissent against their regime. However, this system does not seem as stable as one might expect at first glance.
The Ottoman Civil War lasted for more than 30 years. And now it is over. We have saved what we could, but the damage has been made. Will the Empire find its place under the sun again?

The Phanariote Societies have brought peace to the Ottoman Empire after decades of war and have established systems to ensure that the Ottoman Sultan will be unable to effectively further enact any reforms that directly damage the influence of these societies. However, sacrifices for stability must be made and the ability for the Ottoman Empire to reconquer any lands lost in the Civil War would now be rendered impossible though the means of reforms that are implicitly racist against the minority groups that has ensured the downfall of the Empire. Some say that these same reforms may also cause instability within the remaining territory inside the Porte but these claims have ultimately been dismissed...

WARNING: THIS LOCKS RECONQUEST DECISIONS. With the complete success of the Phanariote Societies in the Ottoman Empire. It seems that they are ready to establish their new political systems and ensure the future stability of the Ottoman Empire regardless of the potential aggression between minority groups that that this could create. For now the Sultan would be locked away inside his palace until the society has officially brought peace to the Ottoman Empire and the Army of Faith shall destroy all enemies to the Ottoman State! Huzzah!

The Phanariote Societies that have torn this Empire to pieces in the past couple of decades have finally been utterly defeated! Unable to capitalize on their successful Anatolian uprising their movement has been routed and cities are each day welcoming us as their new saviours. The main leaders have been captured and beheaded, their heads thrown into the Bosporus. We have captured their arsenals and supplies to help for the war effort It is likely we won’t see another rebellion soon : most of the populations are weary and only want peace after decades of war. It is time to finish the still ongoing wars for the better or the worse and let the peoples of our empire rest at least.
