The children of the Teutonic Knights shall never bow!

Our annexation of Danzig opens up the potential to take control of Prussia as well. Danzig is not as vital to Prussia as it is to Poland, but it is still one of the key Balter economic centers. Thus we have the ability to issue an ultimatum to the Prussians to accept our “protection,” like the Balters of Livonia. If they refuse, it shall mean war. Yet there is disagreement as to whether we ought to annex Prussia outright. Our foreign minister has proposed installing a client regime within Prussia while keeping it separate from our other territories. §BThis could allow us to use the Balters in Prussia and Livonia to consolidate the southeastern Baltic coast under German hegemony in the future.§
Prussia must become our eastern frontier!

$FROM_COUNTRY$ was not satisfied with annexing the city of Danzig. Now they have issued an ultimatum demanding that Prussia accept their “protection!” The terms of this arrangement would be enough to render us a puppet of their nation, though they have made vague promises of assisting us in eastward expansion. If we wish to remain independent, then we must wage our most desperate war yet to defend our freedom.
The children of the Teutonic Knights shall never bow!

Our forces have secured control over the region of Greater Poland, with the occupation authority’s headquarters located in the city of Posen (or Poznan as the Slavs call it). This has led many civil and military bureaucrats to refer to the entire region as the “Poznan government.” The collapse of the Polish state has given us a chance to fill the resulting void. We have terminated the military government and replaced it with a carefully selected group of Poles, who shall henceforth rule the “legitimate government of Poland” under our control. This has allowed us to continue our occupation in a more discreet fashion. §BIf we can keep control of the Poznan government for long enough then we may be able to eventually annex it.§

The collapse of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth has seen local elites declare a reborn Kingdom of Galicia (or Halyczyna, depending on whom you ask). However their regency council has been unable to decide upon a monarch. We are in a position to force the issue in favor of our own Head of State, and have received approval from the anti-Commonwealth coalition to act. While the Galicians have little military to speak of, enforcing direct rule could spark a drawn-out partisan campaign, and moreover may outstrip our bureaucratic capabilities. Therefore we will establish a client regime within Galicia to govern it in our stead.
A useful asset…even if nobody can agree on its name.
Planning a Second Partition of Poland

We have left Poland in an exceptionally weak state after the first partition. Now, we may have a chance to finally dissolve Poland for good with little or no cost to us at all. All we have to do is promise to restore the Polish magnates’ old rights, which they lost in the aftermath of the first partition, if they support a pro-Russian coup d’etat carried out by the Russians which we installed in various Polish ministries after the first war. This should cause enough of a catastrophe to tear the last remnant of the Commonwealth to pieces. Of course, if the coup fails, war will be certain.
Send a letter to the magnates.

When the Treaty of Warsaw stipulated that Russian officials be appointed to various Polish ministries, we knew that it was a pretext to further Russian aggression against us. Now they have made their move. With the assistance of the Russian “military mission in Poland” and embittered aristocrats, they have attempted to seize control of Warsaw! Already, pro-Russian militias are battling with the city police, and our cabinet has urged us to denounce what can only be the start of a full-fledged coup d’etat. While the Polish Army is still strong enough to put down these traitors, doing so would hand Russia a casus belli for what would without question be a war for our very survival as a sovereign state. Yet if the outmatched city police is overwhelmed, the coup will spread its tendrils across Poland, and deliver us into Russian hands.
Poland is not yet lost! Crush the conspirators, Russia be damned!
We must accept our place within the Russian sphere…

In a crushing blow for Russian prestige and an absolute triumph for Poland, Poland and its allies have defeated the Russian Army and prevented the complete destruction of Poland. All Russian officials who were once attached to Polish ministries as part of the Treaty of Warsaw have been expelled from the nation, along with any of the magnates who tried to aid Russia. It seems that Poland is not yet lost, at least for now.
Nie rzucim ziemi, skad nasz ród.

We occupy the entirety of Poland and thus the white eagle has been utterly slain. As its allies have proven themselves completely incapable of defending them, we can immediately declare this war concluded and force the Sejm to sign a treaty with us.

Through force or intrigue, Russia has placed a sympathetic government in control of Poland. Their first order of business was to open the way for the Russian Army, which today has marched into Warsaw and demanded the complete dissolution of the Polish nation. The shock from the Sejm and the remaining nobility and other elites at this demand has spread chaos across Poland. The Kraków Voivodeship has declared independence as a free republic, and German troops have marched into Poznan to “maintain order” and “secure the rights of Germans in Greater Poland”. What remains of Poland has been made a Russian client state, and only God knows what form it shall assume. This is the final and inevitable conclusion to the Polish Partitions.

The collapse of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth has left the Grand Duchy of Lithuania in an unsustainable position. Much of their lands have fallen under our control - except for Vilno, that last glittering jewel which so far lies beyond our reach. Control of this city would greatly strengthen our northern border, but Scandinavia covets it as well. We have reason to believe that the White Ruthenian Army, which remains loyal to the old Lithuanian magnates, has pulled back to Vilno and is preparing for a siege. If we wish to steal a march upon Scandinavia then we must act quickly.

The end of the Commonwealth has shattered the Grand Duchy of Lithuania. The Ruthenian traitors have seized over half of our nation, reducing us to our holdout in the west. The White Ruthian Army, the last remnants of the Grand Ducal armed forces, have assembled around Vilnius, preparing to hold the city at all costs. We have heard word of both Scandinavia and Ruthenia making plans against us - God willing, we will stand our ground.

The victory of the Ruthenian rebels has not only shattered the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth, but also the Grand Duchy of Lithuania in turn. Its eastern lands have been seized by Ruthenia, leaving only a rump state in the west which cannot survive. The White Ruthenian Army (which, despite its name, bears no relation to the rebellion), the last remnant of the Grand Ducal armed forces, is assembling in Wilna to make a stand against the Ruthenians. If we can steal a march on the Slavs, we can capture Wilna for ourselves, and complete our seizure of Lithuania proper.

Our forces managed to make contact with the White Ruthenian Army in Vilnius. There we attempted to persuade them to surrender the city without bloodshed, given the chaotic state of Lithuania and the presence of many refugees from the anti-Commonwealth war. The defenders refused, declaring that neither Scandinavia nor Ruthenia would gain their submission! We must make them see the error of their ways by force, and quickly, or else our rival will secure the crown jewel of Lithuania.

”Stanislaw, despised by God and the people, King of Poland, footstool of the Lithuanians and Ruthenians, locksmith of Prussia, cook of Masovia, wheelwright of Samogitia, drunkard of Kiev, swineherd of Volhynia, sausage of Podolia, pederast of Podlasie, beggar of Livonia, prostitute of Smolensk, knave of Severia, and great fool of Chernihiv : We report to you that we have no thoughts of surrendering to you, but are bravely, manfully, and eternally resolved to fight you, your sycophants, and all your followers, and especially you, who can be compared not to a fellow, but rather to a cursed old woman, if one may even call you so.”\n\nThe Cossacks refused our request for them to surrender.

It has become apparent that indirect control of the Cossack and the Tatar lands is not only infeasible, but impossible. So long as they are not monitored by a constant security presence, they will lapse back into nomadism and brigandry, pestering our settled communities with raids and other such menaces. We can only take permanent control of these lands through an extensive colonization program, one which shall require military protection in order to be completed. Thus we have devised a plan to establish a series of militarized voivodeships along the frontier, where the native populations will be forced to sedentarize and will be joined by communities of armed Polish settlers. If we wish to tame the Pontic Steppe, then it can only be through the sword.
We are a Polish voivodeship and bound by the resulting laws.
The Polish have decided to end our voivodeship status and annex us.

Exciting news from $FROMCOUNTRY$, as the voivodeship reports its confidence in its integration into $COUNTRY$ proper! For a long time, the voivodeship worked to bring its territories ever so close to our country, and now that hard work pays off!
We have vanquished the Poles’ precious voivodeship in our homeland! Now is the time to once again decide our own destiny!

Polish imperialism has come to our lands, as Warsaw has installed a puppet government to control us. This can only be a pretext to prepare us for eventual annexation, as befell the other Cossack hosts in the west. Hopefully we shall find some means of escaping their noose before it can draw around our necks…
For now, we bide our time.

The last of the Cossacks have been brought to heel! With the submission of the Akhtuba Host, the western Pontic Steppe has been tamed. It is true that the remote location of the Achtuba-Astrachan frontier makes it difficult to establish a normal voivodeship, and thus we will need a different approach. We have instead created a colonial government which will compel the Cossacks to sedentarize without such an aggressive settlement program as was conducted in the west. This will ensure the smooth assimilation of the Akhtuba cossacks into $COUNTRY$. For now let us celebrate, as the wars of the steppe to put down the Cossack threat are at last over!
Rise of Nikita Semenko and the Revolutionary Insurgent Army

Born near Kyiv to a poor Cossack family, Nikita Semenko’s family soon fled eastwards due to his father’s support for the haydamaks’ insurrections. After his father died of an infected wound, Nikita was sent to live with his relatives in Lviv. There he witnessed the cruelty of the szlachta and the emerging industrialist class. He became involved in leftist circles while periodically returning home. Semenko was fired from his factory job for defending a female worker from being assaulted by the factory owner’s son. He returned home, refining his libertarian communist views and organizing among the Cossacks embittered by the loss of their old lands and ways. Now, after years in prison for his actions, Semenko has once again returned, and has organized the oppressed Cossacks of the Achtuba Protectorate into the Revolutionary Insurgency Army! His anarcho-communist peasants became the bane of the countryside, before Semenko’s men converged on the capital. The colonial government has fled in terror, but the Poles will return…
The Regional Congress of Peasants, Workers, and Insurgents

”Anarchism is as revolutionary, as diverse, and as sublime in every facet as is human life itself.” - Nikita Semenko\n\nThe Revolutionary Insurgent Army’s first order of business after seizing Akhtuba was to establish a foundation for their new and radical vision of government. Delegates from both urban and rural communities have been invited to the Regional Congress of Peasants, Workers, and Insurgents, a democratic assembly to represent the network of councils springing up across the land. The Congress seeks  "a society without ruling landowners, without subordinate slaves, without rich or poor", and called upon Cossacks to begin building this society by themselves, "without tyrannical decrees and orders, and in defiance of tyrants and oppressors throughout the world." All private lands are being seized and made public. The Congress finished by agreeing to hold a second meeting once the west is liberated…
No gods, no masters, only the people!

When we heard of anarchist militias organizing in our Achtuba Protectorate, we first thought that it was no more than alarmism - after all, had the Cossacks not been completely subjugated? The arrival of the tattered survivors of the colonial government, however, have impressed upon us the magnitude of this threat. They speak of the whole Protectorate in chaos, overrun by terrorist Nikita Semenko and his Revolutionary Insurgency Army. It seems that our efforts to sedentarize the Cossacks has driven many of them to turn to Blanquism to address their newfound status as peasants or urban workers. Rumors abound that the RIA has already penetrated the eastern voivodeships…
Take a bow from the red Cossack! §R(JOIN THE REVOLUTION)§

The Cossack rebellion is worse than we had imagined. The voivodeships have plunged into anarchy - the anarchy of Nikita Semenko and his RIA. Polish settlers have been attacked by mobs of peasants, while Polish industrialists have been hounded through city streets by irate workers. There is seemingly no place east of Kijów safe from Semenko’s thugs, as the siren call of Blanquism has proven too powerful for the Cossacks to resist. Some speak of this rebellion as a manifestation of nationalism, but what it is matters little at the moment. The important thing is that these insurgents have been largely welcomed by the rest of the Slavic populace, and foreign Blanquist groups have already declared their support for Semenko’s uprising.
These damned Cossacks, unruly to the bitter end.
Birth of the Free Territory of Ukraine

Commander Semenko and the rest of the RIA’s Military Executive Council knew that creating the Zavolzhye Republic was only the beginning of their mission. It was a good foundation, but now, they and the Ukrainian people have forged something even greater. With most of the Wild Fields now under the control of worker and peasant soviets (councils), an All-Ukrainian Congress of Peasants, Workers, and Insurgents has been convened. At this Congress, it has been decided that the Zavolzhye Republic shall be superseded by a new, decentralized confederation of anarchist soviets under the leadership of the Congress and the Council - the Free Territory of Ukraine! Never in human history has such a wild experiment of anarcho-communism been attempted. The Poles thought that they would destroy the Cossacks, but they merely finalized their proletarianization, and now the Cossacks ride forth against Warsaw under the black flag of anarchism. May Commander Semenko lead us to the liberation of all those beneath the Polish yoke!

”Anarkhiya-mama syniv svoyikh lyubyt', Anarkhiya-mama ne prodast', Svyntsevym doshchem voroha pryholubyt', Anarkhiya-mama za nas!” - “Mother Anarchy Loves Her Sons,” Revolutionary Insurgency Army song and unofficial anthem of the Free Territory of Ukraine\n\nWarsaw’s unrelenting war against Cossack and Tatar nomadism has led to unforeseen consequences. By forcing the peoples of the steppe into lives of sedentary labor, the Poles have awakened their class consciousness. The endless march of capital into the Wild Fields has at last met its match in Commander Nikita Semenko. His anarcho-communist Revolutionary Insurgency Army has rallied the Cossacks to the banner of a rebellion in the name of Mother Anarchy. It may well be the last Cossack rebellion, but if this is their fate, they shall ride forth and meet it smiling - and, if foreign socialist powers intervene, they might even win…

Nikita Semenko has not acted alone. Knowing that the Russian people have also fallen under the Polish yoke, he helped Russian anarchist Andrei Dutov infiltrate the Polish puppet state. Now Dutov’s Russian Socialist Revolutionary Party has built sufficient support amongst the workers and peasants of central Russia to seize power!

Nikita Semenko has not acted alone. In preparation for his uprising, he helped Russian anarchist Andrei Dutov infiltrate our northern protectorate. Now Dutov’s Russian Socialist Revolutionary Party has built sufficient support amongst the workers and peasants of central Russia to seize power, and join forces with Semenko against us! A general strike brought their economy to a standstill, and Russian laborers and soldiers have formed soviets (councils) under the leadership of “Chairman” Dutov, repudiating all allegiance to us. However, we know from sources within both movements that Dutov and Semenko, and their movements in turn, are not nearly as friendly as it would appear from the outside. We may be able to sign a separate treaty with Dutov to allow our forces to focus on the Ukrainians, but doing so would leave Central Russia beyond our control, and may even allow Dutov to seek Russian unification.
They will find no safety in numbers!
Perhaps we should accept the loss of Russia…

The final rebellion of the Cossacks has come to an end, with Polish and Lithuanian forces once again in control of the steppe. The soviets have been dismantled, and all those who fought beneath the black flag of anarchism will be punished, with or without the instruments of the law. Ominously, Nikita Semenko’s body has not been located. It is believed that he perished in the siege of Akhtuba, but no physical evidence of his death has been found. Wild stories are already being thrown about of his miraculous escape. In all probability his bones are waiting to be discovered in a ditch somewhere. At any rate, the power of the Cossacks has for the last time been broken. The entrenchment of the colonial structure in the east will prevent any repeats of this insurrection. The Wild Fields are wild no longer, and from Astrachan to Kijów, none dare to challenge our authority.
The raiders shall ride no more.

How!? How can this be possible!? The greatest soldiers of the Commonwealth have gone against the bandits of the east - and lost! The military high command is at a loss to explain this outrageous failure. They ascribe it to everything from massive partisan opposition by Ruthenian sympathizers, to lack of familiarity with the landscape, to the wrath of God. In truth it does not matter why the war was lost. What matters is that the Free Territory of Ukraine, God help us, is unbowed. A peace treaty has been signed in Kyiv, revising our borders to recognize the loss of the Cossack lands. The world watches in horror as the black flag of anarchy flies high above Europe, and the Ukrainians are now free to carry out their mad experiment in governance, or lack thereof.

It is a dark day for the peoples of eastern Europe. The Tatar menace has not only survived our assault, but they are stronger than ever. Facing the invasion of the Polish and Lithuanian heartlands, we were left with no choice but to sign a peace treaty allocating all of the Wild Fields to the Tatars. This is the catastrophic conclusion to our eastern policy - a defeat this monumental has sowed eternal doubt within the hearts of our people as to the ability of our nation to tame the eastern frontier. Perhaps it was not meant to be tamed.

Centuries of struggle against the Tatars of the steppe have finally come to an end. With their great confederation laid low, we have taken the opportunity to dissolve it. The Tatar lands far to the east have been left in the hands of obedient local lords who are more interested in ruling their own people than striking against us to take vengeance. All lands which we have not generously reserved for the remaining Tatars will be properly settled to prevent any future rebellions. May the spirits of past generations slain or stolen into slavery by the Tatar menace rest easily, now that they have been avenged, and the steppes tamed.

It is a shameful day for the peoples of our Commonwealth. The Cossack menace has not only survived our assault, but they are stronger than ever. Facing the invasion of the Polish and Lithuanian heartlands, we were left with no choice but to sign a peace treaty allocating all of the Wild Fields to the Cossacks. This is the catastrophic conclusion to our eastern policy - a defeat this monumental has sowed eternal doubt within the hearts of our people as to the ability of our nation to tame the eastern frontier. Perhaps it was not meant to be tamed.

Centuries of struggle against the Cossacks of the steppe have finally come to an end. With their great confederation laid low, we have taken the opportunity to dissolve it. Already our ministers are planning out networks of settlements by which we will colonize the Wild Fields, now that their restive populace has been brought to heel. In time even the peoples of the Ukraine will be forced to realize that the Cossack way of life is at an end. In time, a new and civilized order shall arise in the east.
A welcome conclusion to the drama.

As promised, we have guided the rulers of Moscow into control over all of central Russia. Now comes the time for them to fulfill their obligations to us. In a grand ceremony, the “Tsar” of Muscovy has confirmed the status of the Commonwealth as Muscovy’s protector. While the festivities were carefully structured to avoid any direct scenes of submission on the part of the new Muscovite ruler to avoid poisoning his reputation among his new subjects, there is no doubt that Muscovy lies within our grasp. It is possible that the Muscovite regime will eventually falter in the face of renewed Russian nationalism, but for the time being our influence in Muscovy appears stable.
The bear is declawed at last.

For far too long Ruthenia has been a slave to other countries,and even now, after we finally gained our independence, the countries around us are planning on putting us in chains again. We must never let this happen again, we will not be consigned to the dustbin of history! All men of Ruthenia are prepared to fight for their homeland and their shouts of “Glory to Ruthenia” will let everyone know that we will fight to the death!
The Second General Rada of the Rus’

Slava Rusi! Ruthenia has fought for and won her independence, and now has secured her borders. With both of these urgent questions of sovereignty answered, we now have the security to turn to greater political questions. A Second General Rada of the Rus’ has been convened at the Kyiv Gymnasium, to determine the political structure of the nation going forwards, and draft a constitution. Perhaps the most momentous question is whether Ruthenia shall satisfy herself with regional ambitions, or whether she shall set her sights on even greater goals…
The Establishment of the Provisional Government

Volodymyr Doroshenko, Hetman of the Ruthenian Army, opened the General Rada by officially resigning his position, henceforth participating as an ordinary delegate. He explained that he did not want to unduly influence the assembly through his rank. That being said, he still commands tremendous respect, and may end up in power anyway. Regardless, the first order of business was the creation of a provisional government, constituted out of the All-Ruthenian National Congress which led us to freedom from the Polish-Lithuanian yoke. This government shall conduct the basic functions of governance until the Rada is concluded and a constitution adopted.

The General Rada has been interrupted by squads of peasant volunteers from the Ruthenian Army, who have converged upon Kyiv. So far as we can tell, they lack a clear leader, but their demands could not be clearer. The self-proclaimed “peasant delegates” seek the immediate abolition of all forms of serfdom or peonage, and the transfer of all noble-held lands to their peasant residents without any compensation to the landowners - including the magnates’ manors! We believe that these protests will eventually burn themselves out, but some of the more anxious delegates believe that we need to crack down on the demonstrators to prevent them from throwing the city into chaos and overrunning the assembly.
Let them protest, they helped win the war after all.

Our violent crackdown on the “peasant delegates” outraged the liberal deputies, who wasted no time in abandoning the General Rada and meeting with influential peasant soldiers who survived the “Kyiv Massacre.” The two factions agreed that the attack was clear evidence that the nobility was out of control, and needed to be purged from power for the sake of the people. Soon afterward, liberal forces and rearmed haydamakas descended upon the Kyiv Gymnasium! The nobles were forced out of the assembly, and the liberals, led by prominent lawyer Valerian Khyvlovy, seized control of the General Rada. Soon they will finish the new Ruthenian constitution…
Extremism in defense of liberty is no vice.

To avert disaster, a few popular liberal deputies went out and met with the most influential members of the “peasant delegates”. These high-profile negotiations assured the peasants that land reform would be forthcoming, allowing the assembly to move forward. So far they have agreed that freedom of speech and freedom of assembly will be constitutional rights, and that any political party which registers with the government shall be allowed to freely contest any election. The topic which looms in the distance, hurtling towards us all, is the nature of the Head of State.
The eyes of Ruthenia are upon us.

The Second General Rada of the Rus’ has been quite civil - until now. The monarchists and the republicans have descended into furious arguments about the fundamental nature of our future government. The monarchists argue that only a king can provide stability, and win us respect in the eyes of the other nations of Europe. The republicans counter that one need look no further to see the weaknesses of monarchism than Poland, and that the Ruthenian people deserve a truly free nation, without the shackles of aristocracy. Whichever side falters first will undoubtedly seek retaliation. In the end, the General Rada decided that…
Ruthenia needs a king for the sake of her honor.
Ruthenia needs a republic for the sake of her liberty!

The republicans have refused to accept the idea of a Ruthenian monarchy. A hardcore group of agitators quickly assembled around radical liberal lawyer Valerian Khvylovy, who sought to seize control of the General Rada and purge the monarchists! The next few days after the monarchists’ political victory at the assembly were tense, as all of Kyiv hummed with rumor. It seemed that nobody could predict the strength of the republicans, or whether Khvylovy’s conspiracy even existed outside of his personal clique. Eventually, however, matters came to a head. This morning, Khvylovy’s supporters assembled at the Kyiv Gymnasium to storm the assembly and remove the monarchists by force. Soon enough…
Khvylovy and a few other liberal extremists were swiftly arrested.
Hundreds of radicals surged inside and ousted the reactionaries!

A strange faction has emerged amongst the delegates. They champion the Hetman of the Cossacks for leadership of our prospective republic! As they argue, while he might be a coarse man, his charisma and fame amongst the lower class would cement our government’s popularity with the common people, especially the peasantry. Furthermore, the Cossacks’ military power, if combined with our own strength and political zeal, could lay the foundation of an even greater state - a unified Russia, a union of all the Eastern Slavs, beneath our banner. And by being the ones to make the offer, we could decide upon the terms by which he would be given power. It is true that many radicalists, particularly Valerian Khyvlovy, have denounced the pro-Cossack faction for “searching out a Caesar,” but it is a tempting opportunity.
We will never betray our loyalty to the spirit of human freedom!
ALL the Eastern Slavs, beneath our banner? Make the offer.
A Hetman of All the Rus’!

In a grand ceremony at St. Volodymyr’s Cathedral in Kyiv, Cossack Hetman Stepan Sternenko was coronated as “Hetman of Ukraine and all the Rus’!” Shortly after leaving the church where he was crowned, he gave a brief but colorful speech in which he declared that Kyiv will be the birthplace of a new Russia, a Russia forged in the Wild Fields and the struggles of the haydamakas. While many liberal intellectuals are aghast at this betrayal of the Radicalist ethos, the common people seem awed by Sternenko’s promises of future glory. The one potential wrinkle in this grand design is Scandinavia. They have been keeping a close eye on us since our independence from the Commonwealth, and their opposition to pan-Russian nationalism is no secret. They will not take kindly to our new ambitions…
The Final Session of the Second General Rada

In spite of all obstacles, the monarchists have garnered enough support to push forward their goals. But who shall wear the crown? The leading candidate is, predictably, Doroshenko. From the moment he resigned as Hetman, there were whispers that his highly public resignation was a calculated stunt to enhance his reputation. Doroshenko would likely make a fine king - he is shrewd, confident, and pragmatic. Yet he is not the only candidate. The young Prince Mykolay Chetvertynsky comes from a family with Rurikid roots that has produced multiple Orthodox metropolitans. Mykolay won fame during the independence war as the youngest haydamak commander, renowned for his ferocity. The prince has turned heads with his bellicose rhetoric, proclaiming his desire to unite all of the Eastern Slavs beneath our banner. Even Doroshenko has not gone so far as to make such lofty proposals, and Mykolay, despite his mercurial reputation, may be our best chance at a greater destiny.
Coronation of the King of Ruthenia

In a grand ceremony at St. Sophia Cathedral in Kyiv, former Hetman of the Ruthenian Army Volodymyr Doroshenko was crowned King Volodymyr I! Doroshenko has promised to respect the will of the people, though he shows no desire to reduce the power of the monarchy. Volodymyr’s ascent has marked the withering of pan-Russian nationalism within Ruthenia, and the pursuit of a separate, Uniate national identity. This has met with approval from the great powers, especially Scandinavia, who have long feared the rise of an aggressive East Slavic realm.

The new Ruthenian constitution has been ratified and signed! The liberal document establishes Ruthenia as a democratic federation, with significant autonomy reserved to the provinces and their legislatures. The constitution guarantees universal male suffrage but also requires all men to serve in the military when required. With the government’s foundation established, many have proposed that the federation may be destined for greater matters than a mere regional power within eastern Europe. Perhaps we shall take leadership of all eastern Slavs…
Long live the free Ruthenian people!
The Organization of True Ruthenians Strikes!

Not everyone was eager to support pan-Russian ambitions in Ruthenia. The Organization of True Ruthenians (OTR), led by notorious haydamak leader Symon Mazepa, have for years supported the complete supremacy of the Ruthenian Uniate Church and the defense of the aristocratic order. Now, with the Ruthenian government openly espousing reformism, the OTR has made their move. This morning Mazepa led the OTR and sympathetic Halychian and szlachta army officers in an attack on Kyiv! They have circulated a manifesto explaining their actions as being “in defense of a free Ruthenia, of her ancient nobility, and of God’s Holy Ruthenian Uniate Church.” The Uniate zealots have encountered stiff opposition from a broad section of Kyiv’s citizenry, from Orthodox Christians to Jews to pan-Russian nationalists and even Blanquists! Yet they command strong support from the nobility and the Uniate clergy. An OTR defeat here could have cataclysmic effects on the Uniate faith…
The anti-OTR coalition thwarts the coup!

The OTR acted quickly upon seizing control of the government. An emergency session of the national assembly was convened to officially recognize Symon Mazepa as President - given that the building was surrounded by armed Uniates, they had little choice in the matter. The OTR has also forced through a new constitution, reorganizing the nation into a unitary state ruled directly from Kyiv with the Ruthenian Uniate Church as its official state religion. President Mazepa has pledged to defend the nation from “Poles, Lithuanians, Jews, Turks, Russians, socialists, and all others who would threaten our beautiful Ruthenia.” The one foreign power who seems excited by this development is Scandinavia, who has been quick to form a military alliance with us in the name of safeguarding the stability of eastern Europe.
We were born at a great hour.
Coronation of the King of Ruthenia

In a grand ceremony at St. Volodymyr’s Cathedral in Kyiv, Prince Mykolay Chetvertynsky has been crowned King Mykolay I of Ruthenia! In his coronation address, the new King welcomed the adoption of a constitution and announced his commitment to religious toleration, though he made it clear that the Eastern Orthodox Church would henceforth receive preferential treatment. The constitution, drafted chiefly by the conservatives, has nonetheless upheld and expanded civil liberties, organizing Ruthenia as a federal monarchy with certain autonomies for the provinces and their legislatures. The one area where the king has not moderated his tone whatsoever is pan-Russian nationalism : King Mykolay I closed his address with, “I swear before God as my witness that when I next address you, I shall do so as Emperor of all the Russians!”

We had hoped that an independent Ruthenia would stabilize eastern Europe and prevent either the Poles or the Russians from growing too powerful. It is now clear that this plan had a fatal flaw : it did not account for Ruthenia embracing pan-Russian nationalism. The Ruthenians have, in a fit of madness, elected Cossack Hetman Stepan Sternenko as “Hetman of all Ukraine and the Rus’!” Sternenko and his Cossacks have made clear their intent to unite all the Russians beneath their rule. We cannot allow that mob of unwashed barbarians to become a threat! A unified, Ruthenian-led Russia must not come to pass, or else all of our lands east of the Gulf of Bothnia will be forfeit. Our generals are urging our Head of State to issue an ultimatum to the Ruthenians, demanding that they publicly disavow pan-Russian projects or face war.
We must prevent a united Russia!
We are occupied at the moment, but we will withdraw our diplomats.

We had hoped that an independent Ruthenia would stabilize eastern Europe and prevent either the Poles or the Russians from growing too powerful. It is now clear that this plan had a fatal flaw : it did not account for Ruthenia embracing pan-Russian nationalism. The Ruthenians have elected a liberal coalition which seeks to expand their federation across all of Russia! The reported pacifism of their ruling party has failed to materialize. We cannot allow this unruly band of peasants to become a threat! A unified, Ruthenian-led Russia must not come to pass, or else all of our lands east of the Gulf of Bothnia will be forfeit. Our generals are urging our Head of State to issue an ultimatum to the Ruthenians, demanding that they publicly disavow pan-Russian projects or face war.
We must prevent a united Russia!
We are occupied at the moment, but we will withdraw our diplomats.

We had hoped that an independent Ruthenia would stabilize eastern Europe and prevent either the Poles or the Russians from growing too powerful. It is now clear that this plan had a fatal flaw : it did not account for Ruthenia embracing pan-Russian nationalism. The Ruthenians have crowned Prince Nicholas Chetvertynsky, descended from the old Rurikid dynasty, as King Nicholas I, who has declared his intent to claim the title of “Emperor of all the Russians!” We cannot allow that mob of unwashed barbarians to become a threat to our control of the Baltic! A unified, Ruthenian-led Russia must not come to pass, or else all of our lands east of the Gulf of Bothnia will be forfeit. Our generals are urging our Head of State to issue an ultimatum to the Ruthenians, demanding that they publicly disavow pan-Russian projects or face war.
We must prevent a united Russia!
We are occupied at the moment, but we will withdraw our diplomats.

Our announcement of pan-Russian ambitions have gone down poorly amongst the Scandinavians. As soon as we made our intentions known, Scandinavia withdrew all diplomatic personnel from Ruthenia. Their ambassador, in his final message to our government, curtly informed us that Scandinavia “cannot endorse any program which may jeopardize the security of eastern Europe.” It is fortunate that this seems to be the extent of their protests. Now, the road to the unification of Russia is open - despite Scandinavia’s objections.

Scandinavia has refused to accept our pan-Russian ambitions. At first we thought they might withdraw their entire diplomatic staff from Ruthenia in protest, but to our shock they have gone even further. Shortly after the last member of the Scandinavian embassy was withdrawn, we received a message from the Nordics by way of the Venetian ambassador. It stated that the current Ruthenian government was “in complete opposition” to peace and stability in eastern Europe, and demanded that we not only renounce all pan-Russian ambitions but immediately remove our current Head of State from power and crown Prince Hans af Stewart of Scandinavia as our king! This is an outrageous demand, and many in our government at first thought it a hoax. But it is legitimate, and we have every reason to believe that if we defy Scandinavia, then they shall declare war. How should we respond?
It seems that we have no choice in the matter but to accept.
The Scandinavians can go to Hell!

”Ruthenia has always aspired to be free, but being surrounded by enemies, she has been forced to seek a protector, and in turn a master. At all points when she has looked for an alliance, she has been made first a subject and then a slave.” - Jean-Jacques Arouet, 1731\n\nRuthenia’s troubles did not end when she liberated herself from the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth. Scandinavia, long the greatest foe of pan-Russian nationalism, supported the Ruthenians prior to their victory in the war for independence, but has now turned against them. In theory this conflict stems from the Ruthenians’ refusal to crown a member of the House of Stuart, Scandinavia’s dynasty, as their king. But far more objectionable to Scandinavia is Ruthenia’s new espousal of pan-Russian rhetoric. If Ruthenia falters here then she will remain what she has been since the coming of the Mongols : a pawn for greater powers. If she prevails, then Europe shall tremble.

The concept of a resurgent Ruthenia with its “lofty ambitions” did not bode well for the Nordics. Despite our efforts in preserving our sovereignty and to uphold our free, God-given right to exist as a family of fraternal nations, all of it was for naught despite our cries to the international community. The once noble East Slavic peoples are once again forced to submit in this new reality where they will once be another pawn to European ambitions.\n\nThe Ruthenian government at Vilnius has been forced to submit to the demands given out by the Scandinavian government effective now, stipulating that the lands of the former Principality of Belarus and the Kingdom of Galicia-Volhynia be restored to their natural borders under Scandinavian influence reducing Ruthenia to its former Ukrainian lands around the Principality of Kyiv, nothing less than a mere shell of its former itself.
How will the Varangians of old react to such treachery?

Our incursion into Ruthenia was a resounding success! The ragtag Ruthenian upstarts were quickly beaten back due to their irreplaceable losses on the battlefield and their inability to contend with Scandinavian mettle and were forced to sue for peace. With it we can be relieved that the dream of a resurgent Ruthenia is dead. Furthermore, the Ruthenian government has warmly received our terms to instill again the needed stability in the region, firmly bringing it under our “protective influence” as a much needed bulwark against Russian expansion, much to the rejoice of Unionist and pro-Scandinavian elements in the Riksdag. Peace has been restored to the Slavic lands once more!
Order has been restored once more.

”And in the great new family,
The family of the free,
With softly spoken, kindly word
Remember also me.”
- Taras Shevchenko, Ukrainian poet

 With the Ruthenians victorious in the conflict, the dream of a free, fraternal Pan-Slavic state endures!
”U mene nemaye druziv, u mene ye sim’ya”

Our incursion into Ruthenia was a spectacular mess. Despite many officers in the Hæren insisting that the incursion will be a cakewalk, some even boasting that the “charade can be settled in two weeks'', we have been begrudgingly mistaken.The steppes of Ukraine and the mountains of the Carpathians are awash of fallen Scandinavian sons who have trekked into this foreign land thousands of miles away from home. Our government, quick to avoid public opinion turning against us in the midst of unfavorable coverage of the war by the press (at times even making past censors) has been forced to sign an honorable peace with the puny Ruthenians. We might have failed in subjugating the East Slavs and putting some sense into their whims, but at least Scandinavian honor and resolve still remains intact.
We must be ever vigilant in the times to come

As soon as the Second General Rada of the Rus’ was opened, debate centered around the so-called “Russian Question.” The presence of such a powerful neighbor on our border has led many delegates to argue for our unification with Russia. They claim that as the Ruthenian peoples are fellow eastern Slavs, we should join hands with our kin to the east. This line of thinking has been denounced by the Ruthenian Uniates, who have decried the Russophiles for throwing away our hard-won sovereignty. They see unification with the Orthodox Christian Russia as the kiss of death for Uniate Christianity. All told, the “Russian Question” has provoked such ferocious arguments within the Rada that no other business can be accomplished until it is settled.

The confrontation over the “Russian Question” has spilled out into the streets! This morning, Orthodox and Ruthenian Uniate militias clashed throughout the city of Kyiv, sparked by rumors that each faction was planning to purge the other. The haydamakas have divided along religious lines, and both sides seem equally matched. This is the climatic moment which shall decide the future of Ruthenia and her people. Whichever side prevails will doubtlessly conduct a campaign of cultural suppression against the vanquished. Will Ruthenia retain her independence, or become another player in the great Russian orchestra?

Following a skirmish amongst the delegates of the Second General Rada of the Rus’ in Kiev, the Orthodox Christian (or Russophile) faction has prevailed over its Uniate opponents. They have wasted no time in drafting and submitting a formal request for the unification of our nations, citing our long historical and cultural ties. The measure commands broad popularity across the Russian and Eastern Orthodox Christian worlds, so there seems to be no reason to deny them.
We welcome the return of White Russia to her motherland!

The Ruthenian Uniates have crushed the Russophile traitors! With their defeat and subsequent purging from the General Rada, the Uniate-liberal coalition was swift to draft a new Ruthenian constitution. This document establishes Ruthenia as a democratic federation, with significant autonomy reserved to the provinces and their legislatures. The constitution guarantees universal male suffrage on the condition of military service. The only remaining question is how this proclamation of an independent Ruthenian republic will be taken by the Russians…
Long live the free Ruthenian people!

A calamity has befallen Ruthenia! The Second General Rada of the Rus’, a body convened to establish the new Ruthenian constitution, has been seized by Ruthenian Uniate zealots. Survivors of the so-called “Battle of Kiev” have relayed tales of militias hounding Orthodox Christian delegates through the streets. Worse, the Rada has proclaimed Ruthenia to be an independent state with no connections to Russia! This is of course absurd. As we all know, the Ruthenians are merely the White Russians, long estranged from us due to Polish and Lithuanian imperialism. We cannot allow a gang of crypto-Catholic criminals to oppress the Russian people!

Russia has refused to accept our declaration of independence, nor our constitution’s assertion of a separate national identity from their own. They have declared Ruthenia to be “the occupied territory of White Russia” and have denounced our “persecutions of the Orthodox Christian community”. We have every reason to believe that these accusations herald a Russian invasion! It seems that the first war of Ruthenian independence was not to be the last. We must make another stand for our freedom, this time against our fellow eastern Slavs.

”If Ruthenia did not collapse in the first weeks of the revolution - when she had no organs of government other than a legislature in recess and a hetman often unable to communicate with his army - then she will not collapse now.” - Ruthenian Foreign Minister Mykhailo Khrushchev\n\nRuthenia’s declaration of independence and assertion of a separate national identity has been rejected by Russia in the most vivid way imaginable. The Russian government insists that “Ruthenia” is nothing but a vestige of Polish imperialism created to cleave the eastern Slavs apart, and given Ruthenia’s failure to acknowledge this “truth,” have resorted to military force to assert their claim. Ruthenia, so newly free, is now thrown into a fight for her life against the Russian bear. Many doubt her chances, but the Ruthenians have already proven to have a talent for upset victories - a talent she will need to exercise if she has any hope of survival.
This is only a special military operation.

In the end there was little doubt who would prevail in Russia’s quest to liberate its western lands. The bandits of the west proved incapable of fending off a coordinated invasion from a more numerous and battle-tested enemy. Once Russia’s opponents had been swept from the field, they assembled in Kiev to conclude hostilities. This treaty dissolved the unlawful bandit regime and transferred White Russia to the rightful control of her motherland. Russian forces have already begun a campaign to remove any symbols or iconography which could be used by future criminals to resurrect the illegitimate, Polish-spawned entity which has now been erased from the face of Europe. The Uniate Church has not escaped this fate, with many metropolitans pressured or even forced to break ties with the Holy See. Even the very name of Russia’s defeated enemy has been suppressed by her officials. The final consolidation of the eastern Slavs will surely open the way for more conflicts to come amidst the ruins of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth.
The possibilities are limitless for a united Russia.

David has beaten Goliath! Ruthenia has forced back the Russian invasion and asserted her independence for all the world to see. Her newly minted army, with its officers drawn in part from the haydamaka captains, proved a match for those who so haughtily denied Ruthenia’s existence as a separate state. With Ruthenia prevailing across its entire eastern frontier, Russia was forced to seek peace terms, and thus their representatives gathered in the Ruthenia capital of Kyiv. The resulting treaty affirmed Ruthenian sovereignty, with Russia forced to explicitly recognize the Ruthenian nation and people as different from their own. This victory has quashed pan-Russian nationalism across eastern Europe, potentially for a whole generation. Russia may revive its dreams of hegemony over the eastern Slavs in the future, but for today, Ruthenia is Ruthenia, and she is free!
§bSlava Rusi! Slava Rusi!§ §YSlava Rusi! Slava Rusi!§

Our pan-Russian aspirations have hit a slight snag : the realization of east Slavic unity has already been accomplished by a nation other than our own. This has thrown pan-Russian nationalism into question, with many Ruthenian Uniates claiming that to sign our nation away into Russian hands would be to surrender our cultural identity. What was once a dominant ideology within Ruthenian society is now coming under increasing scrutiny, as Ruthenian nationalism ascends to take its place. We must come to terms with the fact that the first page in the history of a unified Russia has already been authored by foreign hands.
There will always be a Ruthenia…

When Ruthenia freed itself from Polish oppression, we had expected the White Russians to join forces with us in the unification of Russia. It is thus with great shock that we have received news that Ruthenia is mustering their armies for war against us! Ruthenia has declared themselves to be the sole protector of the eastern Slavs, and will not relent until all of Russia is consolidated beneath their rule. We cannot allow the Uniate papists to destroy the one true Orthodox Church! If these spawns of the Poles seize control of all of Russia then our faith will surely perish. Even the Cossacks may strike against us in our embattled state. For our sake, for the sake of Russia, and for the sake of all the righteous followers of our Lord Jesus Christ and His Patriarchs, we must put down the Ruthenian menace, here and now!
The War of the Three Sisters

Ruthenia, Ukraine, and Muscovy have all declared themselves to be the protectors of all eastern Slavs. These nations have in turn rejected demands from their rivals to submit to their authority. Eastern Europe thus finds itself awash in turmoil, with a three-sided civil war breaking out amongst the children of the Rus’ for hegemony over their cultural kin. Whoever prevails shall surely become the beacon of Slavic culture throughout the world when they establish a modern pan-Russian state. It is difficult for outsiders to comprehend how Great Russia, Little Russia, and White Russia - three lands which speak almost identical languages, and with so many similarities between their peoples - could find themselves locked in such a bitter conflict. But it is from this similarity that a desire to find difference has been born, a desire which has driven the three sisters of the Rus’ to sororicide.
The War of the Three Sisters

The Ruthenians have declared their intent to unify Russia, and are locked in conflict with their counterparts to the northeast, who share the same ambition. We, too, seek to bring unity to the eastern Slavs, and therefore we must act! Now is the time to lay both powers low while they are distracted. If we falter, then the pan-Russian nationalists will surely be purged from our government and we will be forced to abandon any notions of a greater destiny for our people.
We must turn our gaze inward, to the Wild Fields.

We have recently taken control of the lands of the Duchy of Nitra, or "Slovakia" as its nationalists call it. However, only a small amount of Nitran territory is officially claimed by our nation. Our foreign minister has advised that we recruit sympathetic Slovakian politicians to create a protectorate that will rule their territory in our name, while we keep control of the Ruthenian lands in the east. A few ministers have argued in favor of continuing the occupation, but the Slovak lands are well-suited to guerilla warfare, which could threaten our control of the region if we make an enemy of its people.
Organize a loyal Slovakia under our control.
Military occupation is the only answer.

With our intent to spread Mother Russia across the plains of Siberia: A colonial company has been created for the purpose of constructing the infrastructure, towns and services required to effectively rule over this untamed wilderness. We have given them a total mandate over all territory in this area including land which is presently held by hostile powers and uncivilized nations.
The Company will secure the East!

The recent discovery of Oil in Azerbaijan has made the small country incredibly wealthy as Russia languishes in the worthless territories of both Georgia and Armenia. This cannot continue- Russia must take the Oil in Azerbaijan for itself!

Russia's Baltic Focus had claimed both Finland and the northern Baltic States but had completely ignored the territory of Lithuania due to the continued existence of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth. However, since the Commonwealth has now ceased to exist it is only wise that Russia proceeds to claim central Lithuania as its own territory to further secure its claims on northern Europe.

With Russia's Panslavic Focus and the complete and utter destruction of the Commonwealth and Poland being complete. Russia now has a opportunity to claim the rightfully Ruthenian territory of Brest as a protectorate and core territory of the Russian State!
Russia is experiencing a Golden Age

Our colonial efforts have often fallen into setbacks due to a lack of a valid local domestic arms and ration industry. We must build modern small arms and rations factories in $CAPITAL$ to ensure that these setbacks are not continued.

We have finally done it. $CAPITAL$ now rules over a united Russia for the first time in history and the sheer euphoria of such a moment will likely allow us to get away with plans of of mass expansion that would be unthinkable in western Europe. Our Tsar and his subjects now stand ready to bring Russia to greatness.
The End of the Golden Age
With the Tsar either dethroned or with his power reduced by liberal movements. The Russian Golden Age has effectively come to a end.
The End of the Golden Age

It is clear by now that Liberal, Socialist and Nationalist agitation throughout the Russian Empire has effectively ended the Russian Golden Age. Reform, is not something that the backwater Russian states have ever been well known for and while liberals ravaged Central Europe in the late 18th century and early 19th century : Russia might as well have been on another plane of existence. However with the formation of a unified Russian state a great deal of western liberals and socialists had made their way over to the rising great power and started agitation throughout the lower classes and military. The Tsar must act now or risk a potentially disastrous rebellion!

During one of the Tsars many national tours, a man with a improvised explosive rushed his coach and blew it up. Since the suspect had been killed along with the Tsar, there is little or no way to tell whom the individual that assassinated the Tsar was. It is also likely that he was from one of the many groups in Russia seeking to increase their influence by destabilizing the Empire but there is absolutely is no way to be sure. The new tsar, a young man with a rather short temper is expected to make a announcement regarding who should be blamed for this incident...
The Socialists and Liberals are to blame. Abolish the constitution!
The Reactionaries are to blame. Reform further!

The Russian Empire has effectively ended as a military coup, backed by liberal and socialist intellectuals has taken place. These individuals had watched as the worrying trend of tyranny coming from the Tsar was leading to a inevitable collapse of the empire and had successfully pleaded to the military to take action before it was too late. However, in a ironic twist of fate- the provisional government was unable to prevent several regional governors from declaring independence and the empire had effectively completely collapsed anyway. It is now up to the provisional government to reclaim these territories in the hopes that one day it may be able to gain enough legitimacy to end the temporary dictatorship and create a true democracy in Russia.

The Provisional Government has been completely successful in reclaiming the lands that had been lost to the various rogue governors after the military coup. As a direct result of this restoration it has now gained enough legitimacy to have a serious debate about the future of the Russian State and if the Junta should continue, a Democratic Republic be created or the Tsar restored with effectively no power. The ultimate fate of Russia is up to the Provisional Government...
The Provisional Government has effectively collapsed as either peaceful or violent efforts to rapidly democratise Russia have been successful.

With the conclusion of the first partition of the Commonwealth, a proposal has been put forwards regarding granting full Russian Citizenship to all non-polish minorities in the former eastern territories of the Commonwealth. This should strengthen our claim on the territory and prevent further nationalist uprisings in the future that may be to the favour of the Commonwealth. However, this policy is exceptionally radical and many more conservative figures in the Russian Government would prefer if we were to just ignore this proposal.
A bold solution, but one that needs to be taken.

Soviet Narodnykh Kommissarov', transliterated Russian for 'Council of People's Commissars', was the highest government authority in Soviet Russia, per functions delineated in the $YEAR$ Constitution of the RSFSR. The Sovnarkom was (formally) responsible to the Congress of The Soviets and had, when said Congress was out of session, the power to issue decrees carrying the full force of law.
With our expansion into Siberia declared, we must directly integrate Kazakhstan into our nation. A few bribes, a bit of diplomatic manipulation and it shall be a integral part of Russia.
With our expansion into Siberia declared, we must directly integrate Zhetysu into our nation. A few bribes, a bit of diplomatic manipulation and it shall be a integral part of Russia.

Lately, the Altai economy has seriously deteriorated, resulting in the increasing poverty of its people. The causes were varied: declining number of fur-bearing animals probably due to over-hunting by both Altay and Russians, declining number of livestock as a result of the export market to Siberia, and periodic natural disasters (especially droughts and plagues), which took a fearful toll on livestock herds. The end of Dzungar rule in Altai brought chaos, bands of Altay began plundering and burning Mongolian shops. Altay nobles were divided on their course of political action. The Altay governor, Gombo-Dorzhu, advocated becoming a protectorate of Russia, hoping that the Russians in turn would appoint him governor of Altay.

With the creation of the Irtysh Governatorate and the aftermath of the Hindustan Conference opening up Central Asia as a potential flank by envious Great Powers- we should focus on the immediate conquest of Central Asia. \n\n§RThis decision unlocks the Post-Hindustan Great Game decisions.§W
Our domination over the steppes is now uncontested and the Governorate of Irtysh now rules entirely over this territory. It is time we reorganize the area to better serve our needs.
Our domination over South Turkestan is now uncontested: it is time we organize the area to better serve our needs.
The Great Game Comes to Bukhara

We must unite the Uzbeks into a single state, with sovereignty over all our ancestral land. Under Uzbek leadership, all of Turkestan will one day be united!
We must unite the Uzbeks into a single state, with sovereignty over all our ancestral land. Under Uzbek leadership, all of Turkestan will one day be united!
We must unite the Kyrgyz into a single and modern state, with sovereignty over all our ancestral land. Under Kyrgyz leadership, all of Turkestan will one day be united!
We must unite the Tajiks into a single and modern state, with sovereignty over all our ancestral land. Under Tajik leadership, all of Turkestan will one day be united!

After centuries of warfare following the invasion of the accursed Manchus, we have managed to bring unity back to China. It is time to claim for good the Mandate of Heaven, and reunify the ancient Chinese nation!

column2: Due to the low value assigned to the birth of daughters, female infanticide has become wide-spread across much of China. The practice has become so common, in fact, it has led to a shortage of women.
The population should recover in time.

Due to our cultural preference for male children, we are now experiencing a shortage of women of marrying age for our male population. This has resulted in a large amount of discontent throughout our country. We are taking steps to try and encourage couples to keep their female children, but such a process will take a generation or two before we can recover from this state of affairs.
The Rong Empire promised that there would be a war in 1856. Then we shall do whatever we can to prepare for such a war...
With our focus on the great conquest of the steppe. We are unable to supply our researchers in any reasonable way.

The Rong Dynasty was a result of a compromise between a Millenarian Figure known as Li Xiuquing, now known as the Qingzu Emperor, and the various warlords and ancient dynasties scattered around the south of China. Li Xiuquing had failed in his ultimate ambition to once again claim the mandate of heaven but had at least completely dislodged the Southern Ming dynasty from the region. The failure only came as the remaining warlords and dynasties formed a coalition to stop the Taiping Rebellion from completely taking over the south of China with the help of the peasants. As the various individuals following the Taiping religion were ultimately limited in numbers and power and the chances of their survival without a widely recognized leader were too small, Li Xiuquing was  recognize to be the new emperor in the region. The name of the dynasty would be inspired by the ambitions of the followers of the Taiping Faith: the Rong Empire, the ever-prospering and the ever-glorious kingdom in Zhongguo. This claim would ultimately be flimsy at best, nonetheless the Rong Dynasty was born.
1746 was a interesting year. 1856 will be more interesting.

A hundred and ten years ago upon this day, the Taiping Rebellion had started. This rebellion had completely failed to created a Heavenly Kingdom of Great Peace as it lacked any considerable leadership but had at least toppled the warlords in the region and forced the Southern Ming to acknowledge that they had no claim over it any more. The empire that had been created from the many compromises and deals made with the Confucian majority would be known as the Rong Dynasty, a dynasty that was forced to acknowledge Confucian teachings but at the same time teachings of the Taiping religion. This anniversary is remarkable because the most important promise made to the Taiping leadership would be that the Rong Dynasty must embark upon a final conquest of China on this date or run the risk of another rebellion. Rong has grown strong in the many years since the rebellion and it seems that they are now intent on a final conquest of China.
It seems we have little choice but to: §R DECLARE WAR ON EVERYONE §W

A hundred and ten years ago upon this day, the Taiping Rebellion had started. This rebellion had completely failed to created a Heavenly Kingdom of Great Peace as it lacked any considerable leadership but had at least toppled the warlords in the region and forced the Southern Ming to acknowledge that they had no claim over it any more. The empire that had been created from the many compromises and deals made with the Confucian majority would be known as the Rong Dynasty, a dynasty that was forced to acknowledge Confucian teachings but at the same time teachings of the Taiping religion. This anniversary is remarkable because the most important promise made to the Taiping leadership would be that the Rong Dynasty must embark upon a final conquest of China on this date or run the risk of another rebellion. However, the Rong Dynasty had been wiped out in the middle of their preparations and now China is left waiting for a inevitable war that has yet to happen. As $COUNTRY$ owns Nanjing, it has the intent to embark on this inevitable war and do what the Rong could not.
Let unify China: §R DECLARE WAR ON EVERYONE §W

The mad Rong Dynasty has just mobilized its citizenry and is now mindlessly charging towards our borders with the intent to unify China in its entirety regardless of the cost. We need to respond by mobilizing our citizenry as well and preparing for what looks to be the final war in China before total unification.
This looks to be our last stand

$FROMCOUNTRY$ has declared that it is the rightful unifier of China and has mobilized its citizenry for a total war. We need to respond by mobilizing our citizenry as well and preparing for what looks to be the final war in China before final unification.

One hundred years ago to this day, the various warlords that were controlling the south of China had agreed on a pact with the madman Li Xiuquing to allow for some sense of stability between the Christian population and the Confucian population. However, one of the promises made would be that the Rong Empire would embark on a great conquest of the rest of China before one hundred and ten years are up. It appears that the chances that the Rong Empire will invade the rest of China are now total regardless of whomever is currently in control of the empire. Everyone, even the Rong Empire itself must prepare before Eighteen-Fifty-Six arrives.
The rate of cultural and religious conversion has reached a fever pitch in $STATENAME$. It is inevitable that they will soon follow the way of our lord and saviour.
We have encountered Taiping Zealots in $STATENAME$. We have promptly removed them from our territories.
The Chinese Conquest of the Steppe

After over a hundred years of diplomatic isolationism from international politics. The Taiping Empire has decided that it would be best if it were to begin a conquest of the Steppe which has remained in a state of broken feuding nations ever since the fall of the Dzungar Khanate. As such, it is now poised to conquer the lands that China has not had since the glory days of the Han and Laio Dynasty.
The Chinese Conquest of the Steppe

The Qing Empire has saved China from the Madness of the Taiping Empire. Now, the newly strengthened Qing Empire has decided that it would be best if it were to begin a conquest of the Steppe which has remained in a state of broken feuding nations ever since the fall of the Dzungar Khanate. As such, it is now poised to conquer the lands that China has not had since the glory days of the Han and Laio Dynasty.
The Chinese Conquest of the Steppe

The Chinese Nation has been formed after centuries of pointless feuding and arrogant dynasties that think that they have a claim to such a state. This new China has now decided that it would be best if it were to begin a conquest of the Steppe which has remained in a state of broken feuding nations ever since the fall of the Dzungar Khanate. As such, it is now poised to conquer the lands that China has not had since the glory days of the Han and Laio Dynasty.
The Conclusion of the Steppe Conquest

We have completed that which has not been done since the glory days of the Han and Laio Dynasties. The Steppes have been conquered! Who knows what will happen next in the history of China but there shall be no further issues from the likes of any Khanate in the Steppes.
Inner Mongolia is a land with countless Chinese inhabitance in it. We must reconquer it from the various steppe kingdoms that have suppressed their Chinese populations for generations.
The Tamir Basin is filled with Islamic Uyghurs and non-Chinese people. However it is a very powerful strategic point and will be useful for future wars.

It is time to end the legacy of a mad khan who effectively destroyed China for generations and finish this great conquest in the process. There is no true need for this land aside for the fact that it is the other half of the Tamir Basin.
As China is now once again the dominate power in the world (by far). We should repay the Mongolians for the mistake that was the Yuan Dynasty by promptly doing a conquest of their lands.

During the events of the Warlord Era, Tibet had broken off and declared itself independent of Chinese custodianship. Since this was obviously a mistake on the part of the Tibetans, we must remedy this.
During the events of the Warlord Era, Mongolia had declared itself independent with the idea that there was no way that China could ever rebuild itself again. However, we did. Mongolia must die.
