With these acts we will finally break the hegemony of the Balters.

We are now ready to correct the errors of past Scandinavian governments and bring freedom to the Balts. This will entail, among other measures, the seizure and redistribution of Balter estates to their Baltic tenants, the replacement of German with Scandinavian, Estonian, and Latvian as the languages of governance and schooling, the abolition of all Baltic Knighthoods and other feudal remnants, and the enfranchisement of all Estonians and Latvians as full citizens. Finally, the old Balter realms will be reorganized into the provinces of Estonia and Latvia, their borders drawn to reflect ethnic boundaries rather than medieval fiefs. With these acts we will finally break the hegemony of the Balters.

Ever since we finished our conquest of Livland - a ‘pars pro toto’ referring to Estland, Livland proper, and Kurland and Semgallen, together as a unit - in the prior century, we have avoided interference in its political order. This has left the German-dominated feudal system which arose during the Northern Crusades of the XIIth century in place. Livland is thus a labyrinthine patchwork of noble estates, dominated by the four Baltic Knighthoods of Estland, Livland, Kurland and Semgallen, and Osel, to which all noblemen belong. The Balters (Baltic Germans) enjoy great autonomy and keep the natives under a brutal regime of exploitation and assimilation. §BAs long as the ultra-reactionary Balters are left in power, they will fight to maintain their old privileges. Only a comprehensive assault upon the entire Balter social order, in both Livland and Prussia, could end their rule.§
The Teutonic ghost looms large in the east…

We are a state ruled by Balters, the German descendants of the settler-soldiers of the Northern Crusades. This has given us a feudal system if government which will only end through a comprehensive effort to dismantle it.
We will keep the natives in check.

The Balters are outraged by our attacks upon their feudal codes. They have pointed to numerous laws and treaties created in the past by which our ancestors conferred upon them "eternal" rights and autonomy. Even if we were to disregard these old agreements, the Balters have such a monopoly upon local governance in their homelands that it would be impossible to enforce our restrictions. Most of the cabinet believes that we must reverse course until a more permanent solution to the Balters' codes can be found.

With the Finnish crisis resolved, national attention is now turning to Livland. This region has been a maze of feudalism for centuries, with all power held by the Balter nobility and middle class. This arrangement is becoming intolerable for a modern nation such as ours. The time has come to consider how to address the "Baltic Question," lest a foreign power answer it for us. After all, Livland commands a position of great geographical value, and has always been a tempting target. If we do not come to a resolution soon, the Livlanders might seek independence with the aid of a foreign power - they have laid such schemes in the past, after all.

The left-wing parties are reaching a consensus : Livland's feudal Balter order must come to an end. So long as it persists, the Baltic natives will never be free, and our nation will be plagued by a reactionary cancer. A plan is now circulating among liberal and socialist authors which calls for the dissolution of all Balter lands and their transfer to their tenants. It also calls for the replacement of the Baltic provinces with new states of Estonia and Latvia, ones with all residents, regardless of class, religion, or ethnicity, represented in regional assemblies. If the government were to announce its support for the proposal, it would win us the eternal loyalty of the Balts - but also the eternal hatred of the Balters and their reactionary allies elsewhere in our nation.
We must strive to end the Balts' oppression!
This would only cause needless instability.

We have weathered the Finnish storm. This has strengthened our position in the east and opens the door into further power projection in the Baltic Sea. At the same time we must prevent similar crises from arising in the future - such as in Livland. Liberals within the empire have been raising the issue of the Balters and their supposed repression of the natives. Needless to say this talk must end at once. The Balters are some of our greatest allies, and we must preserve the Germanic order in the east. Still, a permanent policy for Livland will have to be found.
We must solve the Baltic Question…eventually.

King Christian appeared in Riga today, to the delight of the peoples of Livland. After being received by the Archbishop of Riga, the king gave an eloquent address in which he urged the Livlanders to remain united in the name of "the honor of the nation, of the holy Protestant faith, and of your everlasting fidelity to Us and to Our government." His heartfelt appeal to the Livlanders and their shared religious ties seem to have calmed immediate tensions. However in the aftermath of his visit, it has become clear that the government sees no need to change the Livlander political order.
Why fix that which is not broken?
The Aftermath of the Finnish Crisis

The calamity in Finland has forced us to reevaluate our policies in other sensitive areas of the realm, such as Livland. It is now clear that regions we once assumed to be safely assimilated may in fact be in danger of nationalist unrest. Livland is no exception, as the Finnish national awakening has also fed into Estonian and in turn Latvian cultural revivals. The Balters also remain aloof, defiant of any attempt to rein them in and bring order to their feudal domain. We must come up with a solution to prevent another national crisis between the natives and the Germanic ruling class - preferably by cementing Scandinavian culture in Livland.
We must solve the Baltic Question.

Our men at the interior ministry have dredged up an old policy from the 17th century which attempted to assimilate Livland. Known as the "uniformity policy," it sought to impose Scandinavian laws throughout Livland, including the usage of the Scandinavian language in all government and religious documents. The policy was hated by the Balters and withdrawn after several influential Balter lords were caught reaching out to the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth for support against the Crown. Nevertheless it was the most aggressive attempt by the Crown to assimilate Livland. Given our growing dissatisfaction with the Balters' conduct, such a policy could be useful if applied through modern methods.
Perhaps its time is not yet over…

The conservative parties are reaching a consensus : Livland's feudal Balter order must come to an end. So long as it persists, the Balters will never truly accept our rule, and their cruelty will drive the natives to revolt. A plan is now circulating amongst conservative authors which calls for the unilateral imposition of Scandinavian law into Livland. This would include the dissolution of all Balter lands and their redistribution to Estonian, Latvian, and Scandinavian tenants. It also calls for the imposition of Scandinavian as the main language of the Livlander government, schools, and churches, with a possible option for Nordic-Baltic bilingualism. In short, a revival of the Uniformity Policy, but one which goes even further. If the government were to announce its support for the proposal, it could finally assimilate Livland - but it would also earn us the hatred of both the Balters and the nascent Baltic nationalist movements.
This would only cause needless instability.

We have been unable to decide upon a solution to our problems in Livland. The growth of Baltic nationalist movements cannot be denied. Yet the Balters have refused to relinquish any political or economic power to the natives. For the time being, the Balters and the power of the Church of Scandinavia should be able to preserve order in Livland. This is not a salve, but a bandage. If our realm is ever destabilized by the loss of important territory - such as Pomerania - and if we do not expand our political horizon enough to adopt more radical tactics to address Livland, then we may lose it.
Foundation of the Estonian Salvation Committee

Estonian nationalism has been on the rise ever since the publication of the Kalevala and the subsequent Finnish national awakening. The Estonian are closely related to the Finns, and the struggles of their northern kin have emboldened them. A new group known as the Estonian Salvation Committee has been formed out of a merger of multiple smaller Estonian nationalist organizations. The Committee, like most Balts, is disturbed by the rise of a powerful Slavic state on our frontier with Baltic ambitions. Therefore they demand the recognition of the Estonian people as Scandinavians, the creation of a Duchy of Estonia encompassing all Estonian speakers , and granting Estonians full citizenship. The Balters have of course vowed to oppose any challenges to their monopoly upon political and economic power.

The Balters had vowed to oppose the ESC, but only now do we realize what they meant by such statements. This morning we were informed that the four Baltic Knighthoods have organized German militias to purge the local government of all non-German influence! Any Scandinavian, Estonian, or Latvian holding a government job has been placed under arrest. The Duchies of Estland, Livland, and Kurland and Semgallen have all been swept up in this wave of hysteria. Our forces stationed in the east have fortified their barracks, and we are attempting to make contact with the provincial governors to force them to restore order. Given that nearly all of their forces are Balters, however, such orders are unlikely to be carried out even if we could relay them. This is a matter that will not be solved quickly….

Initial attempts at negotiation between Copenhagen and representatives of the four Baltic Knighthoods have hit a wall. The Balters are horrified at the growth of Baltic nationalism, and blame Copenhagen for preventing them from taking aggressive measures to stamp out the rise of Estonian and Latvian national identities. Our loyalists in Estland, Livland, and Kurland and Semgallen have accused the Balters of keeping the natives in a degraded condition of serfdom and silence that has given the Balts no other option but organized agitation to make their voice heard. Regardless of these accusations, action must be taken quickly to put a stop to this insurrection. Many Balters would prefer independence to seeing the destruction of their feudal order, and if we do not grant them a form of autonomy which satisfies their desires, then they will likely seek foreign support for their secession from Scandinavia. Time is running out, and the Balters, self-serving as always, will surely go to any possible length to defend their privileges.
We cannot let Livland slip away…

The interior ministry has put forth a plan to defuse the current crisis. They have proposed that we reorganize the eastern territories of Estland, Livland, Kurland and Semgallen, and Prussia into a single “United Duchy of Balterland,” bringing all of the Balter-ruled territories into a single unit. This would prove a formidable counterweight to Baltic nationalism, and would give us an excuse to push the medieval systems in Prussia and Livland towards a more modern framework as a condition of Balterland’s formation. In the future - when the Slavs have been pacified to such an extent that they pose no threat to our control of the Østersøen - we may be able to reintegrate the Balters, once they are convinced of their place within our domain. §RWhile the plan would mean decentralizing our eastern possessions it may be our only hope of preventing a Livlander secession.§
Compromising with the Balters got us into this mess! Never again!
If that is what it will take to keep order in Livland, so be it.

The Balters were quick to accept our proposal to end the Baltic Crisis, and we have now restored balance to Livland. “Balterland” has been formed out of the four Balter-ruled states under our control, comprising eight cantons, each with their own Landtags and Land Colleges, as well as the autonomous City of Riga. There is also a unified Landtag and a Convent of the Land Administrators, with each section of the Landtag overseen by a Land Marshal. The Land Colleges and the Convent are appointed by the four Baltic Knighthoods, and above both stands our governor, who has the power of judicial and executive appointment, and other powers of executive prerogative. It is a complicated system, but it shall keep the Balters in line until the threat of the Slavs - be they Polish or Russian - have been dealt with, and we can convince the Balters to reintegrate into our realm. §RIn the unlikely event that a unified Germany emerges, they could induce the Balters to revolt if their influence within the state becomes overwhelming.§
Let us hope this arrangement is indeed temporary.

The Balters have made their move. The Baltic Knighthoods assembled in Riga and, after hours of debate, concluded that Copenhagen had no intention of granting them autonomy. Thus they have resorted to secession! Paternalist forces have purged any remaining Scandinavian loyalists from Riga and seized the city, and with it the economic and political heart of Livland. Orders have been given to the Balter militias to occupy government offices across the Duchies of Estland, Livland, and Kurland and Semgallen, and the Scandinavian flag has been hauled down. In its place has been raised a new banner : that of the Free State of Livland. Duke Alfred III von Ungern-Sternberg has been acclaimed as Stadtholder by the Baltic Knighthoods, and has proclaimed his intent to “defend the ancient rights of the Balter people, won by the Teutonic sword.” Given that the Balters comprise a small minority within the insurrectionary state, he will almost certainly seek help from the Russians and the Poles. Whether or not they choose to aid him, we must now prepare to put down the Balter treason by force of arms.

The Baltic Germans (or Balters) of Livonia have recently rebelled against their Scandinavian overlords due to Copenhagen refusing to address the rise of Estonian and Latvian nationalism. They have declared independence, but Scandinavia has declared this illegal, and is mustering their armies to restore order to the provinces. Thus the Balters have turned to us for aid. The Livonian Balters sought our aid before in the 17th century, when Scandinavia’s assimilationist “Uniformity Policy” provoked the Balters to open negotiations with the Commonwealth for a possible defection to us. In the end the matter fell through but now we have another opportunity to swipe the Baltic states away from Scandinavia. Of course, even if our intention is to claim Livonia outright, we will have to obscure such a motive when dealing with the Balters - and once they discover our intentions, they will doubtlessly resist us. Still, this may be our last chance to keep Livonia out of Scandinavian - or Russian - hands.
We cannot spare any resources at this time.

The Baltic Germans (or Balters) of Livonia have recently rebelled against their Scandinavian overlords due to Copenhagen refusing to address the rise of Estonian and Latvian nationalism. They have declared independence, but Scandinavia has declared this illegal, and is mustering their armies to restore order to the provinces. Thus the Balters have turned to us for aid. The Livonian Balters have more than once turned to Russian aid to safeguard them against Scandinavia and Poland, and this time appears no different, giving us a chance to swipe the Baltic states away from Scandinavia. Of course, even if our intention is to claim Livonia outright, we will have to obscure such a motive when dealing with the Balters - and once they discover our intentions, they will doubtlessly resist us. Still, this may be our last chance to keep Livonia out of Scandinavian - or Polish - hands.
We cannot spare any resources at this time.

Livonia has been a coveted prize for the nations of northeastern Europe since the Northern Crusades of the 13th century. The Scandinavians, the Poles, the Germans, and the Russians have all vied for dominance, with the native Balts always caught in the middle. Now the Baltic states have once again ignited an international crisis. The Balters, accusing Scandinavia of allowing Estonian and Latvian nationalism to fester, have severed all ties with Copenhagen and declared independence. As in the past, the Balters of Livonia have looked to the Russians and the Poles for aid against Scandinavia. The Nordics, who have already fought two wars in the past against the Slavs for control of the Baltic states, will surely not abandon Livonia easily. As the Scandinavian lion, the Polish eagle, and the Russian bear cast their gaze towards the Baltics, the Germans and the Balts can only wonder at what the future holds : freedom for their people, or another century of oppression?

Victory is ours! Neither the Poles nor the Russians were able to defend the Balters from our retribution. The so-called “Stadtholder” Duke Alfred III von Ungern-Sternberg will face treason charges in Copenhagen, with a life sentence on a cold Atlantic island the probable result. With the insurrection at an end, the time has come to tear out the Balter power structure by the roots. All four Baltic Knighthoods have been dissolved, and all lands held by Balters in Livonia have been seized by the government for redistribution to their Baltic tenants. The three duchies have been reorganized into the provinces of Estonia and Latvia, with state legislatures composed of elected representatives. Most important of all, the Estonians and Latvians have been enfranchised as full Scandinavian citizens. While it is doubtful that the Balters will ever truly forgive us for destroying their feudal enterprise, we have proven our fidelity to the Balts, and they have renewed their faith in Scandinavia.
The Dawn of a New, Scandinavian Livonia

Victory is ours! Neither the Poles nor the Russians were able to defend the Balters from our retribution. The so-called “Stadtholder” Duke Alfred III von Ungern-Sternberg will face treason charges in Copenhagen, with a life sentence on a cold Atlantic island the probable result. With the insurrection at an end, the time has come to tear out the Balter power structure by the roots. All four Baltic Knighthoods have been dissolved, and all Livonian Balter lands have been seized by the government for redistribution, either to Baltic tenants or to new Scandinavian settlers. The three duchies have been reorganized into the provinces of Estonia and Latvia, with state legislatures composed of elected representatives. Most important of all, the Balters’ medieval codes have been replaced by modern Scandinavian law, including the full enfranchisement of all Estonians and Latvians. While it is doubtful that the Balters will ever truly forgive us for destroying their feudal enterprise, we have finally brought civilization to Livonia.
Defeat in the Third Livonian War

It seems impossible, but it is true : We have been defeated by Scandinavia. Our attempts to take control of the Baltic states have been thwarted, and now we must face the consequences. The resulting peace treaty forced us to disavow all claims not only to Livonia, but to Finland and even to Karelia! This is an outrage, but the international community is united behind Scandinavia for the moment, and thus we must bear this indignity for now. In the future, we may be able to proclaim the treaty annulled and renew our defense of our northern frontier. For now, however, we must turn our gaze elsewhere, and work to rekindle the spirit of our people.
Defeat in the Third Livonian War

It seems impossible, but it is true : We have been defeated by Scandinavia. Our attempts to take control of the Baltic states have been thwarted, and now we must face the consequences. The resulting peace treaty forced us to disavow all claims to Livonia, and Scandinavia, after almost three hundred years of struggle, has finally forced us out of the Baltic states. This likely marks the end of our designs on Livonia. Even if we repudiate this treaty in the future, the Balts are unlikely to see us as anything but foreign conquerors..
The problem with the Baltics is that they’re full of Balts.
Victory in the Third Livlander War!

Freedom at last! After centuries of being a mere pawn in Scandinavia’s game, we have cast off the Nordic yoke and defended our ancient rights in the process. Livland stands tall and unbowed, resting upon the unbreakable strength of her Teutonic heritage. The only question now is whether we may have to face additional challenges from the Slavs. To be sure, the Poles and the Russians supported our independence, but we never had any illusions as to their motives. As in the past, they likely covet our lands for themselves. Therefore we must not rest yet - Livland, so newly free, must extend her vigil, and keep watch for the Polish eagle and the Russian bear.

Livonia has become so estranged from our nation that any restoration of the old order in the Baltic states is now impossible. The last remnants of Scandinavian loyalism within Livonia have faded away, replaced with a newfound nationalism sparked by Livonia’s new masters. Even the Baltic Lutheran Church has divorced itself from Copenhagen, stripping away what was once a crucial pillar of support of our rule in Livonia. While the Scandinavian language is still spoken by a slowly declining number of Livonians, the Scandinavian flag no longer stirs any passion within their hearts. Livonia is lost.
Another page of European history written, filled, and turned…
Victory in the Third Livonian War

Scandinavia has been driven from the Baltic states at last! Now that Livonia is independent, we can move on to the next phase of our strategy. Contact has been established with several notable Balter families who hold no love for the Livlander Stadtholder, Duke Alfred III von Ungern-Sternberg, a man rumored to be something of a megalomaniac. Stadtholder Alfred’s rumored plans for an “Eastern State” stretching from Stolp to the Gulf of Finland have alienated many supporters, and now that Scandinavia has been repelled, they are eager for a change in leadership.While the logical idea is to strike north and “liberate” Livonia from the Stadtholder’s whims, it might be simpler to merely force Alfred to resign. This would greatly calm the Prussians and more importantly would preempt any attempt by the Balters to seek German aid against us, §Rwhich they might do if we attack them now.§
All we desire is a peaceful Livonia.
Victory in the Third Livonian War

Scandinavia has been driven from the Baltic states at last! Now that Livonia is independent, we can move on to the next phase of our strategy. Contact has been established with several notable Balter families who hold no love for the Livlander Stadtholder, Duke Alfred III von Ungern-Sternberg, a man rumored to be something of a megalomaniac. Stadtholder Alfred’s rumored plans for an “Eastern State” stretching from Stolp to the Gulf of Finland have alienated many supporters, and now that Scandinavia has been repelled, they are eager for a change in leadership. While the logical idea is to strike north and “liberate” Livonia from the Stadtholder’s whims, it might be simpler to merely force Alfred to resign. This would greatly calm the Prussians and more importantly would preempt any attempt by the Balters to seek German aid against us, §Rwhich they might do if we attack them now.§
All we desire is a peaceful Livonia.
A Crisis in the Baltic Governorate

We had hoped that the removal of the “Ostland” faction of Balters from power after our liberation of the Baltic states would have forced the rest of the nobility into line. This has proven to have been a naive assessment of German greed.The Balters continue to crush any attempt by the Estonians and the Latvians to participate in local politics or even use their native languages. One Colonel Ivan Gerasimov in Pskov has written to us recently with alarm, noting that the Balters have begun to quietly reform their old Scandinavian-era militias. Worse, the governor - himself a Balter, as are most of the governorate’s officials - recently approved a measure mandating that all government documents be written not in Russian, but in German! Several ministers assure us that this is how it was done under Scandinavian rule, but others have urged us to declare the governorate to be in a state of insurrection, and to use military force to break the Balters’ power for good.
The Balters have gone too far, and must be stopped!
Mandate Russian-German bilingualism in the Baltics.

For over five hundred years, Livonia was held in the death grip of the Balter upper- and middle-classes - but no longer. It has been quite a few years since a Balter noble was able to abuse their subjects with wild abandon, or a Balter merchant able to deny an Estonian or Latvian customer business on the grounds of their ethnicity. Local schools, bookstores, and libraries boast growing numbers of Estonian and Latvian works. Even the Baltic Lutheran Church now holds services in native languages, and more and more of the local priesthood reflect their communities at large, not just the leading men. Simply put, we cannot replicate Scandinavian strategies of control in the Baltics. We must find ways to work with the Estonians and the Latvians if we are to integrate Livonia into our nation.
The Teutonic ghost, exorcized at last…

Through peace or force, we have managed to assume hegemony over Livonia. The only question now is how to integrate it. The Estonians and the Latvians would certainly welcome the end of their servitude beneath the infamously despotic and reactionary Balter (Baltic German) elite. However, a direct assault upon the Balter power structure would outrage the Prussians and could invite outside intervention from the Germans. The Balters are nothing if not self-preserving and would likely seek aid from a German power, if one exists, to defend themselves from us. Therefore it might be simpler if we offered the Balters of Livonia the same privileges which the Prussians enjoy, and induce them to submit to our authority without bloodshed. This would of course condemn the Balts to continued servitude.
Livonia must be ours without question!
We have worked with Balters before, let us accommodate them.

The fortress of German civilization in eastern Europe is facing its darkest hour, as the foreign hordes have declared war upon the Livlanders. If Livland falls then we, too, will likely be next, and with us will perish the Teutonic legacy. There is an alternative. Our protectors in the German fatherland might be able to protect both ourselves and our Livlander brothers. If we can convince them to intervene in Livland’s defense, then perhaps we could at last realize the dream of the Teutonic Knights, and become the centerpiece of a pan-Balter state stretching from the Prussian frontier all the way to the Gulf of Finland. Shall we issue the call to the westerners?
Nein, the Livlanders are no friends of ours…

The Balters (Baltic Germans) of Livland have come under attack from foreign forces seeking to drive them out of power. Thus they have turned to the Prussians, and through the Prussians to us, for protection. The Prussians relate that the Livlanders would be open to merging their domain with Prussia to form a unified “Balterland” or “Ostland”, as it is variously known by its proponents, if we save them from destruction. Contrary to the lofty aspirations of German ultranationalists, it is unlikely that we could actually annex such a state after its formation. Yet it would still prove a steadfast subject, and would cement German dominance across the Ostsee. How should we proceed?
Ostland shall not fall to the barbarians!
Leave the remnants of those dog-knights to their fate.

We knew that standing against the Slavs would be a dangerous endeavor. Therefore we reached out to the Prussians and their German backers with a proposal : if Germany protected us against our foes, we would unify with the Prussians into a single pan-Balter state. While in centuries past the Prussians attempted to force our ancestors in the Livlandischer Order into lockstep obedience, this new state would be an equal partnership between the Balters of the north and the south. The ink on the agreement has already been signed, and now we must stand firm against the savages.
Ostland will not fall to the barbarians.

The westerners have confirmed their support for our endeavors! They shall defend the Balter people with all of their strength. This news has been communicated to the Livlanders, who have agreed to unify our domains and coordinate on a common defensive strategy. While the entrance of Germany into this struggle will no doubt escalate it to titanic proportions, we are nevertheless poised to accomplish that which no Grandmaster ever could, and bridge the gap between Prussia and Livonia for the final time.
We must do what Hermann of Dorpat could not.

The Livonian Balters have pulled off a scheme even more outrageous than we could have expected. Working with the Balters of Prussia, they have unified their nations into a single pan-Balter state! This nation has in turn inherited Prussia’s protection by the Germans. Therefore the Germans have now made the ludicrous assertion that if we do not back down, a state of war will have existed between us! While we had anticipated that the Balters would employ underhanded tactics to preserve their feudal order, we did not expect a direct threat of war from the Germans. To submit to their demands would mean allowing Livonia to pass into German hegemony. How shall we respond?
We have no choice but to back down…

”Where, then, are the two swords of the enemies? They were indeed cut down with those swords with which they tried to terrify the humble! Behold, they sent you two swords, the swords of violence and of pride, and have lost many thousands of them, having been utterly defeated.” - Jan Hus, letter to King Wladyslaw II congratulating him for defeating the Teutonic Order at the Battle of Grunwald, 1411\n\nThe Balters of Livonia have played their final gamble to preserve their power. With the Slavs at their gates, they have turned to their German kin for protection, unifying with the Prussians to form a united Balter state. The ruins of Scandinavia’s empire are host to yet another imperial clash, as both the Germans and their rivals seek sole control over the region. Whoever prevails shall hold the key to the Baltic Sea, and with it the future of northern Europe.

We have taken possession of Lithuania, including Vilnius, the “Jerusalem of the North.” The main question is how we will administer Lithuania going forwards. The military has proposed that we simply proclaim Lithuania’s annexation, forgoing integration in the name of keeping order. The interior ministry meanwhile is split between Nordicists who urge us to establish the Balters as the new ruling class in Lithuania, and pragmatists who advise using the “Samogitian” nationalist movement to create an autonomous territory which could be reabsorbed if negotiations with the Latvians are successful. §RThe latter two plans may fail if we do not compromise with either the Balters or the Balts in the future.§
It is fine as it is.
The Balters will civilize these lands.
The “Samogitians” will keep Lithuanian nationalism at bay.

We have taken possession of Samogitia. The main question is how we will administer it going forwards. The military has proposed that we simply proclaim Samogitia’s annexation, forgoing integration in the name of keeping order. The interior ministry meanwhile is split between Nordicists who urge us to establish the Balters as the new ruling class in Samogitia, and pragmatists who advise creating an autonomous Samogitian territory which could be reabsorbed if negotiations with the Latvians are successful. §RThe latter two plans may fail if we do not compromise with either the Balters or the Balts in the future.§
It is fine as it is
Appeasing the Samogitians will suppress pan-Lithuanianism.

We have taken control of the Lithuanian heartland, including Vilnius, the Jerusalem of the North. With our removal of the Balter privileges in Livonia, the locals have been more open to negotiation with our central government. The Lithuanians have largely  agreed to work within the Scandinavian political system so long as their cultural rights - including those of the non-Protestant religions in Lithuania - are respected.

We have taken control of Samogitia. With our removal of the Balter privileges in Livonia, the locals have been more open to negotiation with our central government. The Samogitian Lithuanians have largely agreed to work within the Scandinavian political system so long as their cultural rights - including those of the non-Protestant religions in Samogitia - are respected.

Scandinavia has decided to create an autonomous Samogitian territory. We are technically part of the Scandinavian state but will retain an independent domestic policy. Thankfully the Scandinavians have kept the Balters from seizing power in Samogitia as they have repeatedly attempted to do since the days of the Teutonic Knights.

With our loss of control over Samogitia, the prospect of projecting permanent dominion over the Baltics, the centerpiece of Scandinavian foreign policy and our political aim for centuries upon centuries, is now nothing short of an impossiblity. Our incompetence will no doubt lead to our downfall.

An idea that was outright impossible for ages has become a reality! After years of careful cunning and the careful use of the stick and carrot approach in the Baltics it appears that the local Lithuanian nobility has been rendered either penniless or docile enough allowing their peoples to be gradually assimilated to Scandinavian customs. Now that our integration efforts have borne fruit we can now fully admit Samogitia and her peoples under under the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ flag.
Abrogate Scandinavian Claims in Northern Germany

With our continual hold over the predominantly Elbian Lower Jutland and Pomeranian holdings that were once under Scandinavian control, The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government with its dominance all over the German states has finally decided to abrogate all Scandinavian claims in the region and requested the foreign ministry to put forth the matter in the International Concert in the Hague to recognize the Elbians' rights to "self determination" in the former territories.\n\nGermany must be whole, and it shall always be!

Numerous Scottish nationalist organizations have appealed to our government, in public or in private, to aide them against the Scandinavians. By far the most prolific is the Scottish National Party, outlawed in Scandinavia owing to its support for armed violence in the name of Scottish independence. With the right money to the right people, we can destabilize Scandinavian rule in Scotland with little chance of the Nordics gathering enough evidence to prove our involvement.

Numerous Scottish nationalist organizations have appealed to our government, in public or in private, to aide them against the Scandinavians. By far the most prolific is the Scottish National Party, outlawed in Scandinavia owing to its support for armed violence in the name of Scottish independence. With the right money to the right people, we can destabilize Scandinavian rule in Scotland with little chance of the Nordics gathering enough evidence to prove our involvement.

Numerous Scottish nationalist organizations have appealed to our government, in public or in private, to aide them against the Scandinavians. By far the most prolific is the Scottish National Party, outlawed in Scandinavia owing to its support for armed violence in the name of Scottish independence. With the right money to the right people, we can destabilize Scandinavian rule in Scotland with little chance of the Nordics gathering enough evidence to prove our involvement.

The Scottish Rebellion has destroyed whatever good will the Scottish had with Scandinavia. However as we are a democratic nation that accepts all cultures equally, we should be able to construct a treaty to grant the Scottish certain unalienable rights and rebuild this lost good will.
We have influenced Scotland to the point where it is effectively ruled from Paris. With our alignment to the English, why not go the full way and annex Scotland entirely?

With the failure of the Scottish Petition, our rise to being considered protectors of the northern British isles and with the Anglois aligning itself to complete integration of all its lands or at least the french. We should claim Ireland as a state that can protected by Scandinavia and not the Anglois.

The Anglois have aligned themselves with the French and have created massive disillusionment in the northern parts of England. As we are now considered the protectors of the northern British isles, we should push ourselves onto the English and rebuild the Danelaw in at least Northumberland.
National Association for the Vindication of Scottish Rights

The resurgence of liberalism across Europe has stirred Scottish intellectuals. Many feel embittered at the government’s focus upon Germany rather than the Stewart homeland. Leading Scottish liberals have now formed the National Association for the Vindication of Scottish Rights. The group’s founding manifesto asserts that Scandinavia’s German lands have consistently received more generous treatment than Scotland. This is in spite, they say, of Scotland having its own pressing issues : extortionate Highland clan leaders, a crime-ridden English border, antiquated ports…They demand that Scandinavia always be styled “the United Kingdom” and that Scotland should be allotted more seats in the Landsting. These are minor concerns but it could open the door to a rise in Scottish nationalism.
The Scottish are always causing trouble.
Rise of the Scottish Home Rule League

The growth of Scandinavian democracy and federalism have also allowed nationalist parties to grow. Such is the case in the Folketing, where the Scottish Home Rule League has recently gained seats. The League formed out of the failed Scottish Repeal Association, a short-lived group which wanted to end the Act of Union and create an  independent Scotland sharing only Scandinavia’s monarch. The more moderate League instead seeks “Home Rule” (a term borrowed from Irish reformists), the restoration of the old Pairlament of Scotland which was abolished by the Act of Union. League representatives have taken pains to stress that they, unlike the Repealers, are opposed to full Scottish independence and merely wish for Scotland to have “the voice which she once possessed and still deserves.” Nevertheless their electoral success has emboldened Scottish nationalism. §RIf a position as moderate as Home Rule cannot bring Scotland more rights, then Scottish nationalism may become truly militant…§
What? We don’t need two Folketings!
Rise of the Scottish National Party

The drastic consolidation of royal power has triggered mass demonstrations across urban Scotland. Glasgow has seen the largest protests, with activists decrying the suppression of Scottish culture and local institutions by the Scandinavian regime. Where Scottish liberals once called for “Home Rule,” or autonomy within Scandinavia, their demands have shifted. The Scottish National Party, heirs to the Scottish Repeal Association, has formed to advocate for the repeal of the Act of Union and the creation of an entirely independent Scottish republic. The SNP has denounced the Stewarts as “traitors to the Scottish people'' and has demanded that Scotland “liberate herself from Scandinavian tyranny.” To defend against government repression, the SNP has formed an underground paramilitary wing, the Scottish Republican Army, modeled on similar organizations in Ireland and England. Many Scots are starting to see the SNP as their only option to defend and reclaim their liberty.
They’d best understand that treason is unacceptable.

For the first time since the 18th century, the English-Scottish border is once again fraught with peril. The Anglois have allowed Scottish nationalists to establish bases in northern England, from which we are all but certain they are spreading agitation across southern Scotland. Cities have seen a proliferation of nationalist bulletins and posters on their streets, and several local Scandinavian officials have been assaulted. There has also been a rise in highly suspicious fires in government offices in the area. The most influential organization amongst the rebels is the Scottish National Party and its paramilitary wing, the Scottish Republican Army, who seek an independent Scottish republic. While the Anglois have repeatedly denied involvement, the regional Scottish administration is convinced of English complicity.

For the first time since the 18th century, the English-Scottish border is once again fraught with peril. The English government has allowed Scottish nationalists to establish bases in northern England, from which we are all but certain they are spreading agitation across southern Scotland. Cities have seen a proliferation of nationalist bulletins and posters on their streets, and several local Scandinavian officials have been assaulted. There has also been a rise in highly suspicious fires in government offices in the area. The most influential organization amongst the rebels is the Scottish National Party and its paramilitary wing, the Scottish Republican Army, who seek an independent Scottish republic. While England has repeatedly denied involvement, the regional Scottish administration is convinced of their complicity.

All of Scotland is filled with energy as the Stewards have for the first time in generations returned to the isle in triumph. Welcomed by cheering crowds in Edinburgh, the monarch and their family have spent days touring the major cities of Scotland as well as the highlands and even the outer islands. No expense was spared decorating for the occasion, with some particularly romantic Scots donning traditional garb for the occasion. The Stewarts also visited some of the new communities being constructed in the Highlands to reverse the degradation of the area due to the Clearances. Many regional Scottish officials are speaking of making today a Scottish cultural holiday going forward, and it seems that Scotland has truly embraced both the Stewarts and Scandinavia. This opens up the potential of advancing our position in the Anglo-Celtic Isles, long a dream of the Stewarts.
We are the true defenders of the isles!

The last election saw the Scottish Home Rule League win an unprecedented landslide victory in Scotland, claiming every Scottish seat in the Folketing. Their members have now brought forth a petition for autonomy known as the Scottish Covenant. The document bears the signature of thousands and thousands of Scots, from the wealthiest elites to the poorest of the poor, in support of restoring the Pairlament of Scotland. The choice of the name “Covenant” is a politically charged one. It recalls the Covenanters who took up arms to support Scottish Presbyterianism against Anglois-backed Catholic rule in Scotland during the Stewart-Castlemaine era of the 18th century. Thus the name is also, in essence, a threat : §RScottish nationalists have gained political hegemony across Scotland. Refusing them autonomy could provoke them into declaring independence.§

The Pairlament of Scotland has been constituted at Pairlament House in Edinburgh, reconvened for the first time in centuries. The current members are a caretaker government until new Scottish elections are held. Members of Pairlament all must swear an oath of allegiance to the Scandinavian monarch in order to hold office, and the Scandinavian flag is displayed opposite to that of Scotland within the legislature’s chambers. The Scottish Home Rule League has dissolved now that it has accomplished its goal, with its members joining new parties with broader platforms. It is hoped that this will provoke a split between hardcore Scottish nationalists and moderates who want to work within the bounds of the law to support their culture.

”MEN AND WOMEN OF SCOTLAND : In the name of God and of the dead generations from which she receives her old tradition of nationhood, Scotland, through us, summons her children to her flag and strikes for her freedom..."\n\nRepeal and Home Rule have both failed in Scotland, quashed by Copenhagen’s centralization. Disillusioned reformists have turned to the Scottish National Party, a Dahlkist group inspired by Irish and English nationalists, and its Scottish Republican Army. A group of SRA militants stormed the Edinburgh General Post Office this morning, where their leader, Tavish Mac Dòmhnaill, read out a proclamation declaring a Scottish republic! The regional government has begun to defect to the SNP and the last telegraph message from our administration there reported armed clashes between Nordic loyalists and nationalist militias before the cables went silent. All of Scotland is now in a state of insurrection.

Scotland, which has for years chafed under Scandinavian control, has been seized by a nationalist regime and declared independence from Scandinavia! The Nordics are now preparing to retaliate and put down their revolution, and the new government under Scottish National Party leader Tavish Macdonald has petitioned us to intervene in their defense. We must act at once to secure our interests in Scotland!
Declare our full support for them.
Is it too much to hope for a diplomatic solution?

”Wha, for Scotland and her law, Freedom's sword will strongly draw, Freeman stand, or Freeman fa, Let him on wi me.” - from ‘Scots Wha Hae’ by Gilbert Broun, Scottish poet and friend of Marinus Dahlke\n\nScandinavia’s repeated quashing of Scottish autonomist proposals has compelled the Scottish National Party led by Tavish Macdonald to declare independence from Scandinavia with the support of government defectors. $COUNTRY$ is furious and has already declared that they will crush this rebellion. Many are saying that the Nordics are correct in their assertion that the Scottish stand no chance on their own, but there is a chance that the present government in England has backed this rebellion - Scandinavia could easily find itself in a fight it cannot win. The Scottish Republican Army is transforming from an underground force into a true military, and the fate of Scotland shall be decided here. Freedom or Slavery.

For the first time since the Act of Union, the House of Stewart once again reigns from Holyrood. The royal family was able to evade the members of the new government who sought to punish them for their misrule, and sailed away under cover of darkness back to Scotland, taking with them the Scottish Crown Jewels and the Stone of Scone, the sandstone block used in the coronation of Scottish kings for centuries. The old Scandinavian monarch has since declared himself King of a restored Scotland! To placate Scottish nationalists he has accepted a sweeping liberal constitution and promised to “atone for the actions and inactions of previous governments” by defending Scottish rights and culture. Our control across the Anglo-Celtic Isles has been shattered, and any areas outside of the old Scottish crown lands will likely fall under the sway of regional governors seizing power for themselves - if the new Kingdom of Scotland does not subjugate them in its quest for new power.
Traitors to the very end, those Stewards…!

No Stewart King has graced the lands of their ancestors since the end of the Anglo-French War of Succession and the ousting of the Catholic Stewart-Castlemaine traitors who had been placed on the throne by Paris. The memory of “Bonnie” Prince Alexander who fought alongside the Highland clans against Catholic oppression still is remembered fondly throughout the country and most Scottish still hold allegiance to the house of Stewart. A royal visit to the country would likely appease the Scottish nationalists, however it cannot be an empty gesture but the culmination of our efforts to develop and integrate the land.\n§RIf we do not resolve the issues plaguing Scotland before 1875, the revolutionaries could gain momentum and try to proclaim the independence of the country§
Create the Royal North Sea Company

The distance between Scotland and Scandinavia is more than just physical. Passenger travel between the two regions is unreliable at best, not to mention expensive. Rates are prone to wild swings as the routes are dominated by a few private companies always squabbling with one another. Let us issue a charter to a new Royal North Sea Company to establish safe, consistent, and reasonably priced travel between Scotland and the mainland. This shall greatly increase the social and economic integration of Scotland into our realm.

Northern Scotland has been subjected to the Highland Clearances, a period where Scottish clan leaders began forcing the eviction of crofters (landless peasants) and sending them south in order to use their lands for sheep herding, to cash in on the booming wool trade. This was also a time when clan leaders’ view of themselves changed : formerly the keystones of Scottish Highland communities, they sought to redefine themselves as a more traditional European aristocracy. Both trends were supported by the Scandinavian government, which sought to consolidate control of the Highlands. The feuds of this era were a factor in the deportation of the Mackay, Dunbar, and Fraser clans’ deportation to Sydoe by the Stewarts. The simplest way to rejuvenate the area would be by modern housing and infrastructure in the Highlands, subsidizing small farmers and providing them with new tools and fertilizers, and sponsoring resettlement there by urban Scots wishing to escape overcrowded cities, especially those descended from cottars (peasants) evicted during the Lowland Clearances.

The Scottish-English border has been especially perilous since the late 13th century. Generations of heavily-armed families on both sides of the divide, the border reivers, switch allegiances like weathervanes, raiding north or south depending on who will protect them. While major raids are now almost unheard of, the region is still quite lawless and filled with smugglers - not to mention vulnerable to an invasion from the south. We must construct a new series of fortifications and secure harbors along the English border, both to defend Scotland and to finally bring order to the border country.
Develop the Elbe and Weser River Basins

Northern Germany has been ravaged over the centuries, being the site of countless battles. The Hollowing and its consequences, not just the death toll but also the emigration which it spurred, have done further damage to a region that was always one of Germany’s least prosperous owing to the poor quality of its soil. Even the coastal cities, the sole beacons of wealth in the area, have suffered due to the ever-growing Atlantic trade. It will take more than just an aggressive expansion and modernization of regional industries, farms, and infrastructure to bring prosperity : we must focus on growing the Elbian German middle class, which for too long has been stifled by the Junkers (nobility) and the merchant elite.

The Hollowing has wreaked incalculable damage across Germany - yet modern science allows us to heal these wounds. Introducing new methods of farming and transportation, along with distributing grain and bread to affected communities, will help not only reduce starvation now but prevent it in the future. Export controls will be imposed to forbid merchants from selling foodstuffs abroad during times of extreme hardship, and laws against price gouging shall be enforced to drive the cost of food back down to a fair level. New housing shall be constructed to accommodate the vast population movements which occurred as a result of the crisis, workhouses constructed to allow the poor to earn a living wage, and factories given tax breaks in exchange for hiring workers who had been forced into itinerancy. Slowly but surely, the scars across the Elbe shall fade.

Nordicism is a cultural movement which is the successor to the Gothicism movement of the 17th and 18th centuries. It sees Scandinavia, the German-ruled Baltics, and northern Germany as belonging to the same social continuum, joined by their Protestant faith and the Baltic Sea trade. Moreover it emphasizes a romanticist view of their common origins in the Gothic people, supporting the Gothicists’ belief that the Goths - and thus all Germanics - originated within Scandinavia, specifically in Sweden. Nordicism as an artistic style, a subset of romanticism, focused on reviving Old Norse motifs, while in Scandinavian architecture, it led to special designs in wood inspired by stave churches. Above all was the notion - aggressively fostered by the Scandinavian government - that the political future of the Elbians laid with the north, not the Catholics of the south.

With northern Germany experiencing a cultural and economic revival, the Junkers have become weaker than ever before. The growth of both coastal and inland communities has imperiled their dominance, and new political winds are guiding the population towards the glorious Nordic brotherhood rather than an imaginary pan-German ideal. Many Junker estates are no longer profitable and so the time has come to force them to sell off their lands to the state to cover their debts, whereupon we shall distribute them to independent farmers. Those who resist shall have their lands confiscated. This act shall finally break the manorial stranglehold upon northern Germany!
Restore our Rule in the South

The rebellious Elbian Germans in Pomerania have kept our realm divided for too long! Bohemia thought that they could use them against us, but they have failed to maintain their influence. With Pomerania removed from their protection we can now strike south and reconquer our rightful German lands!

For decades, German nationalists have infested our southern territories, agitating for secession. Many of them have aligned with Bohemia in support of its quest to bring all of Germany beneath its control. Our police services have been conducting a years-long program to identify and surveil the ringleaders of several prominent German nationalist organizations with Bohemian ties. The time has come to swoop down like a hawk upon these terrorists! Their removal shall deal a great blow to German nationalism in Scandinavia and banish Bohemian influence from the region.

The Royal North Sea Company ensures swift and affordable passenger travel between Scotland and the mainland, increasing Scottish integration into our realm and providing opportunities for sailors all around our realm..
Quito had broken off during the Colombian War. We should reclaim it to ensure that the Viceroyalty of Granada can be completely restored.

The Colombian Wars were a series of bloodbaths that had lasted over twenty one years. Through what now seems like a complete miracle- Spain had prevailed and restored order over Colombia. However- there are already whispers of a potential second set of independence wars and unless we were to reorganize our territory in a way that treat the Colombian people as equals to our Iberian population, it is unlikely that we will be able to hold on to this territory any further then the turn of the next century.

The Viceroyality of Granada has remained by far the most loyal of the four Viceroyalities of Colombia. However, contained inside this Viceroyalty is a region that is known to be completely disloyal to the Hispanic crown and would rather tie themselves to the Incan Empire or outright revolt for independence: Quito. Therefore it should be the immediate imperative of the Hispanic crown to therefore abolish the Viceroyalty of Granada, annex the loyalist regions in the north and establish a new Viceroyalty of Quito which should maintain our interests in the area without catastrophic instability issues.

The Viceroyalty of Greater Salvador has continued to fail to maintain control over the countless warlords hidden in the jungles of the region. Thus, with advancements in Naval Doctrine and Statecraft it has now become possible to abolish the Viceroyalty and deal with the warlords directly.
Destroy the Legacy of Gran Colombia

The Viceroyalty of Mexico was not a creation of the Hispanic crown. It is a abomination that effectively obliterated the concept of New Spain and replaced it with a entire cultural identity that had diverged even further from Spain then regions like Granada or Central America. New schools of Economic and Political thought have enabled us to craft a "valid" claim that the unique identity of the Mexican culture is barely apparent or even non-existent compared to Central Spanish and with these claims we should be easily able achieve full acceptance of this culture inside of a few months and the annexation of the Viceroyalty alongside it- ending the legacy of Gran Colombia once and for all.

The Viceroyalty of Lusitania might as well be ruling over a completely foreign culture in comparison to the rest of Colombia because Lusitania has continued to be the bastion of so-called "Pure Portuguese" speakers who refuse to even try to align their language with the rest of Colombia. As the world continues to get smaller due to continued technological advance in naval construction and ideologies such as "Pan-Hispanism" reach their inevitable climax- we cannot tolerate this sort of behaviour any further and must strive to align their culture with the mainlander Portuguese rather then the wild divergence that they presently are.

The Viceroyalty of Quito was set up after the partition of Granada. It was created due to a general inability to maintain control over that region due to mostly being populated by Native Amerigans and mountainous terrain that heavily limited infrastructure projects. With the turn of a new century, annexation and integration of the north and completion of infrastructure projects such as the Andagoya Canal- there is no further need to maintain the final obstacle to our supremacy over Colombia.

The King of Spain, his cabinet and the countless viceroys, governors and landholders that make up the ruling class of the various Colombian Viceroyalties have met in Havana to discuss the creation of a unified Hispanic Commonwealth. Spain, being in a undeniably advantageous position at this Congress was able to make them agree with the creation of such a union but it was a impossibility to make the Viceroys and the ruling class of these Viceroyalities agree with everything. Concessions would still have to be made and these include the inability for the Commonwealth to integrate Catalonia at any point, the capital would be moved to Lisbon and guarantees that the Viceroyalities would maintain complete autonomy for the time being ( with the exception of the Captaincy-General of Cuba and the isthmus of Andagoya). Will the King of Spain agree with these concessions or abandon the idea of a unified Hispanic Commonwealth?
The King prefers a unified Iberia
The Collapse of the Hispanic Commonwealth

With the independence of Spain from the Hispanic Commonwealth- the Colombian remnants have effectively collapsed into a series of Hispanic and native warlord states. Many of the emergent warlords have claimed the legacy of both the Commonwealth and the former Colombian Alliance, seeking to unify Colombia under their banner. However, no state has either the army or the industry of the old Commonwealth or Alliance to achieve rapid success, making unification seem unlikely and far-flung.
Thus all good things must come to a end.

With Hispania's decline on the international stage- there has been a troubling build-up of unrest in the Colombian lands. This has resulted in the creation of several political groups that demand for either immediate liberalization or independence from the Empire. This unrest has finally come to a head, as both independence and liberalization groups finally deciding to reconcile and ally with the sole intention of either forcing the liberalization of the Hispanic Empire or ensuring its immediate dissolution. The ultimatum has already been sent to the King and they now await a response.
We are forced to agree with them.
The King shall not have his power decreased to irrelevance!

The Hispanic Commonwealth has suffered from countless setbacks, to the point where a power which could have once been called one of the greatest in the world has declined to a point of near irrelevance on the world stage. There are already rumours of a plot to separate Colombia from Spain in the desperate hope that without the dead-weight that is Spain then Colombia could rise to greatness...

Various important political figures from all Colombian states had met in Havana to consider the creation of a new "Colombian Alliance" to deliberately fight back against Iberian influence in Colombia. This council had lasted for no more then a week before they had all unanimously agreed on the creation of such a alliance, and they had even agreed on the second proposal of creating a federal union between all these states. It seems that the creation of a Hispanic Commonwealth had the unintended effect of unifying regions that previously had been deliberately in-fighting between each other...

The second most important question put forwards at the Second Congress of Havana was what type of government this new "unified Colombia" would have. This would take the form of a federal democratic republic as imagined by Herrera, Vincente and the other glorious figures of the First Colombian Independence War, as any other alternatives would be unacceptable in the current political climate. With the inauguration of the first President of the Federal Republic of Colombia- a demand would be sent regarding the immediate withdrawal of Spain from Colombia!
Why resurrect the legacy of Herrera?

The second most important question put forwards at the Second Congress of Havana was what type of government this new "unified Colombia" would have. This would have been a republic if not for the attendance of Pedro, Duke of Coimbra whom had spoken up regarding his affinity towards the plight of the Colombian people, and the legitimacy that could be gained if Colombia had a Emperor. The congress agreed and Pedro was therefore crowned Pedro I, Emperor of the Colombian Empire and protector of the Colombian people. His first proclamation with the support of the congress would be to immediately declare independence from Spain!

The dream of $COUNTRY$ would be born at the Congress of Havana after Spain's successful suppression of the First Colombian Independence War and it would continue to reign supreme as the hegemon of the New World for many years. However, $COUNTRY$ has failed to maintain this prestigious position and has undergone a rapid decline that would ultimately result in a Second Congress of Havana- a congress that would resurrect the legacy of the original Colombian Alliance and declare independence for all Colombia!

$COUNTRY$ has prevailed against the forces that had intended for its destruction. The various political figures that were responsible for this Independence War have been charged with treason and removed from their positions, replaced by far more loyal individuals whom shall maintain the security and stability of $COUNTRY$

With the independence of Colombia and the defeat of the Hispanic Commonwealth in the war that followed- the Hispanic Commonwealth is therefore officially dissolved and no European shall ever rule over Colombia again!

With the independence of Colombia and the defeat of the Hispanic Commonwealth in the war that followed- the Hispanic Commonwealth is therefore officially dissolved and no European shall ever rule over Colombia again!

Spain has known war for decades in 1836. Following the coup of 1808 and the proclamation of a Constitutional Monarchy under the usurper Jose II, Pedro IV rallied his supporters during the Brothers’ War that saw the Peninsula ravaged by war as Liberals battled the Legitimists helped by the Dual-Monarchy. Jose II was eventually vanquished in 1815, sent in exile abroad while Pedro IV regained his throne. Portugal who had been the main base of support of the Liberals, still entertains the legacy of Jose II, with more Liberal plotters in Lisbon and Oporto than in the rest of the country, with many still angered at the relocation of the capital away from Lisbon to Madrid. Nevertheless, the Colombian War has managed to reunite all the Peninsulares against the end of colonial order in the New-World. But after that, who knows what will happen to Spain ?

Our ambassador in Roma has informed us of the death of the former usurper Jose. Brought to power by a seditious assembly in 1808, he and his partisans were eventually vanquished by the rightful King Pedro IV in 1815 with the help of the Dual-Monarchy. Jose was allowed by his brother to settle with a small court in Roma, far from his country. A Liberal inspired by Enlightenment philosophers, his short reign saw the first promulgated Constitution in Europe, while his exile marked the beginning of the Colombian Wars as the colonies refused the return to status quo. With no heir to survive him, Alfonso XV does not have a dynastic opposition to his own rule.

The news of the death of the rightful King of Spain in exile, Jose II has come to the New-World, with a day of mourning declared by the Republic. A reformer brought to power against his brother by the Porto Junta of 1808, Jose’s reign had been cut by the Dual-Monarchy who supported the reactionary Pedro IV. After his defeat, many in the colonies rebelled against the return of Pedro and Absolutism. An embassy sent by Herrera had proposed him the Crown of Gran Colombia but the King refused, having relinquished any claims with his defeat. "
As the colonial war drags on, the people of the peninsula demand peace.

The counter-attack that followed the miracle of Havana and saw the Royal Army get back some ports through loyalists in Andagoya and Lusitania helped secure funds and troops from Spain. But as the news of our losses come back to Europe, banks and our own officials begin to worry about our winning possibilities. The war must end quick lest the unrest at home gets too strong.
Our shameful defeat in the New World has at least satisfied the strong peace party that had grown. Recovery from the war is now our priority.
We can focus on other matters and still be strong!

We have effectively lost control over many local and state authorities and are undergoing a imminent collapse into a civil war. A state of marshal law has been enacted in the territories that still are controlled, but the rest are effectively a lost cause and ready themselves to declare a opposition government against us.
Spain was destroyed as a result or in the aftermath of the Spanish Civil War. If we can re-gather the territories required to recreate Spain: then we should be easily able to do so.
A primary trigger for the civil war was our dismissal of Portuguese Culture as being un-spanish. Since democracy has been restored there is a movement to re-accept our Portuguese population.
A primary trigger for the civil war was our dismissal of Castilian Culture as being un-spanish. Since democracy has been restored there is a movement to re-accept our Castilian population.

Ever since the creation of Spain in the 16th Century, there has been a constant debate regarding which capital the Kingdom should be ruled from. For a short period at the beginning of the 19th Century, the capital was moved to Lisbon for the very first time under the initiative of Jose "the Reformer". However, his successor Pedro IV would opt to move the capital back to Madrid as the Viceroyalities started to collapse into rebellion. Now as the fires of rebellion have finally died down in Colombia either though our ultimate victory or defeat, Alfonso XV has finally decided to put a end to this debate and choose the true capital of Spain once and for all. The institutions of Spain shall be forever be tied to this permanent capital and it shall be never moved again.

$COUNTRY$ has suffered endless setbacks in foreign policy, economic decision making and military mobilization. The result is that Spain, once one of the greatest nations in the world: has been completely crippled. Countless citizens have taken to the streets to protest our persevered weakness and there are already talks of succession or revolution by independence movements or military cliques. It is only a matter of time before a match is struck and $COUNTRY$ burns to the ground.
This is only a temporary crisis

The crisis has hit a new level today as the King has dissolved parliament and taken effective control over the entire apparatus of state with the justification being of emergency circumstances. However, this did not go down well with the population of $COUNTRY$ who have seen fit to permanently cut off communication with the central government and leave the situation in a stand off between the government and these various movements. The fire is beginning to burn...

The Lisbon-ruled Spanish Federation has found itself confused by various reports that state that various city governments in Castille are simply refusing to pay tax with the reason that the federation does not have any right to rule over Castille as the union of crowns that permitted such a aberration has been deposed. A review board has been created and a census is under way to find out exactly causing grief with these local governments beyond that of simple monarchist ties.
The monarchy is dead. They need to get over it.

The Spanish Federation is unable to formulate any policy that could solve these innate issues with the population because as it turns out a clique of military officers have already taken the initiative and have seized Madrid. They are now claiming to be the legitimate government of Spain but have taken no moves to ignite a civil war in the hopes that we will stand down and let them take over the country. This is a stand off. Civil War is inevitable.

One of our most esteemed Generals, one "General Zavala" has seen fit to relocate a large portion of veterans of the Guardia Real to Madrid. Zavala has continued to claim that our republican revolution was a Portuguese conspiracy and that they always felt that the monarchy should be abolished and the capital moved to Lisbon after the betrayal of Alfonso XV in his choice to keep the capital in Madrid. It is likely that he is of very little threat to us because if he attempts to coup the government, the citizens will just counter him with force of arms.

What the government of Spain was somewhat expecting has finally occurred: General Zavala has assumed the apparatus of government in Madrid today by force of arms. The parliament has been dissolved and Zavala is already claiming that the Portuguese traitors shall be dealt with and anyone supporting the ideas of democracy will be suppressed. Naturally, in Portugal and Galicia this has been taken as a insult but the greatest threat lies in the monarchist circles in Castille whom were expecting a immediate restoration after the coup but were denied as Zavala would prefer to remain president-for-life. For a moment, Spain is quiet. However, this stand off cannot last forever. Civil War is inevitable.

$CAPITAL$ has dismissed most government workers and is quickly conscripting as many as possible for the war effort. Anarchy reigns in the countryside and very few even understand who will fire the first shot in this inevitable conflict. Time is running out.

Ever since the end of the Colonial Wars, a rift has been growing in Spain between Lisbon and Madrid after Alfonso XV had decided to place the capital of Spain in Lisbon. Today, the tensions have boiled over as Madrid has been occupied by a military junta that states that it intends to restore stability to Spain and the legitimate government in Lisbon has responded with a declaration of war which has immediately torn the country to pieces. Whomever survives this war will dictate the fate of Spain.

Galicia has no intent to be directly involved in the catastrophe that is gripping Spain and has unilaterally declared independence. Naturally, as this is extremely illegal by the standards of any law in whatever is left of Spain. The military junta has declared war on them.

The nightmare that everyone had expected has finally occurred. A individual claiming to be a member of the long lost original House of Aviz has persuaded a good portion of Castille to break off and declare independence with the expectation of creating a democratic Kingdom of Castille. Only in the chaos of a civil war could have anyone expected such a situation to occur but the seeds were planted back when the capital had been chosen and a good portion of the Castillian population had decided that independence would be preferable to being ruled by Portugal. This threat must be defeated or it will be the death of Spain.

Ever since the end of the Colonial Wars, a rift has been growing in Spain between Lisbon and Madrid after Alfonso XV had decided to keep the capital of Spain in Madrid. Today, the tensions have boiled over as the Government of Madrid has declared war on all forces that intend to destabilize Spain. The result? A reborn Kingdom of Castille has been created by what is said to be a member of the long lost original House of Aviz that intends to restore democracy to a independent Castille. Whomever survives this war will dictate the fate of Spain.
We must save Spain from itself

The regional governments of both Portugal and Galicia have no intent to stay in a country that is quickly collapsing. As losing Portugal could cause the complete collapse of Spain, we have no choice but to declare war on Portugal and Galicia with the intent to restore what is rightfully ours.

Catalonia has decided to dissolve the Iberian Union as a direct result of the rest of Spain being destroyed by a massive civil war. As attempting to reconquer this land during this war would be utter suicide, the government of Spain has decided to let Catalonia go. For now.

The Kingdom of Zanzibar has decided to break its ties to the Spanish Government and attempt to build its own empire in Africa. It is unlikely that we will be able to reconquer them in our current state, so the government has decided to let them go. For now.

We are now on our quest to restore what is rightfully the realm of the Legitimate Government of Spain. However, first we must choose what form of government we will be rallying behind. Either that of restoring the Aviz-Beja Dynasty to their throne or throwing that all away and creating a republic, once and for all.

As the Kingdom of Castille has successfully conquered the remnants of the Spanish Government: Spain has effectively ceased to exist. For the first time in hundreds of years, Iberia is now separated into several new nations rather then just a simple divide between east and west. Perhaps these new nations may be able to reunite Spain one day, or will the concept of Spain just be left in dustbin of history? Time will only tell.

We have defeated the Junta and ensured that they will rule no longer over Spain. However, the Kingdom of Castille has declared that they will not reunite with us and reform Spain and rather maintain their separation from us. We could respond to this by either tolerating their existence and ceding all territory we own that is rightfully theirs back to them or alternatively declaring them and the Galician traitors as illegitimate successions from the legitimate government of Spain and conquer them.
Too much blood has already been spilt
The Legitimate Government is the only government

Through its total victory, Spain has successfully defended its continued existence as a state. The junta is already rounding up any remaining hold outs in its territory and soon it will strike back against any surviving groups who permitted this civil war to occur. For now it seems, Democracy is dead in Spain.

As the Spanish junta has failed to reconquer Spain from Castille and been brought to a stalemate: Spain has effectively ceased to exist. For the first time in hundreds of years, Iberia is now separated into several new nations rather then just a simple divide between east and west. Perhaps these new nations may be able to reunite Spain one day, or will the concept of Spain just be left in dustbin of history? Time will only tell.
Andalusia cares more about our legitimate rebellion then the illegitimate dictatorship. They will gladly choose to side with us rather then the military junta whenever we occupy a province of theirs.

The collapse of Spain has caused its Eastern African territories to declare independence as the newly formed native state of Zanzibar. It is important to note that the relative weakness of this state in comparison to European states upon its formation should make it exceptionally easy to conquer and add to our colonial empire, but if $COUNTRY$ were to leave this any longer then Zanzibar could easily build a military to a European standards and make any conquest attempt exceptionally difficult. So, does $COUNTRY$ invade Zanzibar and add it to its colonial empire or attempt a more diplomatic approach?
Another territory to add to our collection

The victory of England in the Hundred Years War had resulted in it slowly being degraded and transformed into yet another French realm- the accursed Dual Monarchy. Now with the rise of Northumbria to the status of Great Power, it should now be possible to resurrect England as the English realm that it should have remained. For England!

The Occitan people have not had a realm to their own since the end of the Kingdom of Arles. Now with the rise of Tolouse to the status of Great Power, it should now be able to create a new realm for the Occitan people. For Occitania!

Uniting England, Wales and Scotland is the final step in our campaign of forging the Commonwealth of Great Britain. Thanks to our position, we are protected by seas in almost every direction. Perhaps, if we create something like the Royal Navy, we will be able to maintain naval supremacy and dominate the oceans. Now we can finally sing our new anthem - Rule, Britannia!

Uniting Ireland, England, Wales and Scotland is the final step in our campaign of forging the Commonwealth of Ireland and Great Britain. Thanks to our position, we are protected by seas in every direction. Perhaps, if we create something like the Royal Navy, we will be able to maintain naval supremacy and dominate the oceans. Now we can finally sing our new anthem - Rule, Britannia!

The inability for far weaker democratic British governments to successfully take over Ireland remains a complete embarrassment. Our government is now built upon the foundation of authoritarianism and therefore it shall have no qualms with both claiming and annexing Ireland into Britain. For Britannia!
